analyzed: rigs pa de ni thob par 'tshal //

original: yul gyis dngos dang dngos med dang // bstan dang 'bras bu grub pa dang // mi rnams kyi ni pham rgyal dang // sprin gyi kha dog gzugs rnams dang // de bzhin nyi ma zla ba dang // lha yul bar snang sa bla yi //

analyzed: nyi zla dag gi nyin 'khor nas //

original: de dag thams cad ma lus pa //
analyzed: de dag thams cad ma lus pa //

original: dka' thub 'grub pas gsung par 'os //
analyzed: dka' thub 'grub pas gsung par 'os //

original: de skad dris nas gzi chen po //
analyzed: de skad dris nas gzi chen po //

analyzed: gar g-yis ni tshig smras pa // bha gu ris ni gang dris pa //
translated: Garga, spoke these words:🔽Listen to just that which Bhagurī asked,

original: de nyid nyon cig skal ba can //
analyzed: de nyid nyon cig skal ba can //

original: mar me lta bu'i gtsug lag 'di //
analyzed: mar me lta bu'i gtsug lag 'di //
translated: This scripture, which is like a lamp,

original: dgos pa thams cad rig byed pa //
analyzed: dgos pa thams cad rig byed pa //

original: grags dang gsal dang rnams gsal dang / bde sdug nges par rtogs byed pa //
analyzed: grags dang gsal dang rnams gsal dang / bde sdug nges par rtogs byed pa //

original: bram ze gtso dang rgyal po la //
analyzed: bram ze gtso dang rgyal po la //
translated: To the brahmin chief and the king,

original: drang srong mchog gis bstan par bya //
analyzed: drang srong mchog gis bstan par bya //

analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba'i ltas la legs ldan gang gi tshe nyi ma autpa la sngon po lta bu'i 'od can /

analyzed: reg pa na gzi byin du rno ba can /

analyzed: zla ba ltar bsil ba can nam mkha'i dkyil du song la snang ba de'i tshe ni rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro //

original: gang gi tshe nyi ma 'char ba dang nub pa kho na'i tshe 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni gdon mi za bar rgyal po 'tshe bar 'ong la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rna mas kyang 'ong zhing /

translated: When the sun rises and sets as if it were turning like a wheel, then at that time the king will certainly be harmed, the armies of the enemy will come,

original: yul rnams kyang 'khrug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul rnams kyang 'khrug par 'gyur te /

original: de'i tshe yul ni dgon bzhin ri dags kyis gang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe yul ni dgon bzhin ri dags kyis gang bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: yang na nyi ma gzas zin pa yang med par 'od bar 'gyur ba de ni de'i tshe rgyal po de dag gi phyi nang na rtag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //

original: yang dag gi tshe nyi ma @21a * //
analyzed: yang dag gi tshe nyi ma @21a * //
translated: At the time of utter purity, the sun.🔽

original: gzas ma zin par /🔽nam mkha' la phyed du snang ngam /
analyzed: gzas ma zin par / nam mkha' la phyed du snang ngam /
translated: If the sun is eclipsed at the wrong time,🔽does it appear in the sky for half the day?

original: nyi ma nyid nam mkha' la g-yo bar gyur tam /
analyzed: nyi ma nyid nam mkha' la g-yo bar gyur tam /

original: kha dog ngan pa'am /
analyzed: kha dog ngan pa'am /

original: skya bor 'gyur na de'i tshe rgyal po 'tshe zhing /
analyzed: skya bor 'gyur na de'i tshe rgyal po 'tshe zhing /

original: skye bo 'tshe ba dang lo nyes pa dang / chom rkun rnams kyi mthur gyur ba'am /
analyzed: skye bo 'tshe ba dang lo nyes pa dang / chom rkun rnams kyi mthur gyur ba'am /

original: yang na dbang pos char mi 'beb bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na dbang pos char mi 'beb bar 'gyur ro //

original: yang dus mtshams ma yin par nyi ma dang zla ba gzas zin par gyur na /
analyzed: yang dus mtshams ma yin par nyi ma dang zla ba gzas zin par gyur na /

original: de'i tshe mi dag mtshon gyis 'debs la /
analyzed: de'i tshe mi dag mtshon gyis 'debs la /

original: de bzhin du nang dang 'thab pa dag gis 'tshe bar yang 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin du nang dang 'thab pa dag gis 'tshe bar yang 'gyur /

original: rgyal bo yang 'tshe zhing /
analyzed: rgyal bo yang 'tshe zhing /

analyzed: mu ge dang / mi ngas dag gi tshogs chen por 'gyur ro //

analyzed: mi rnams kyang nye du phu nu dag dang mi mthun zhing 'gal bar 'gyur ro //

original: mi'i bu rnams mngal du yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi'i bu rnams mngal du yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: yang nyi ma 'od zer dang bral zhing mi long bu lta bur snang na /

analyzed: de yang nges par rgyal po 'jigs par rig par bya'o //

original: yang na nyi ma nam mkha' la khrag gi 'od can lta bu snang ba de'i tshe rgyal po rnams dang / de la brten pa rnams dang / yul rnams dang / de bzhin du dbang po rnams dang / phan tshun du gsod par 'gyur ro //

translated: If the sun appears in the sky with a bloody light, then the kings, those who depend on them, the countries, and likewise the organs, will kill each other.

analyzed: de'i tshe skye bo thams cad chos dang mi mthun par phyin ci log par spyod pa'i ltas yin no //
translated: At that time, it is a sign that all people will engage in perverse conduct contrary to the Dharma.

original: gang gi tshe nyi ma 'char ba na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe nyi ma 'char ba na /
translated: When the sun rises,

original: gzhu ltar rab tu sgu bar snang zhing /
analyzed: gzhu ltar rab tu sgu bar snang zhing /
translated: if it appears very bent like a bow,

original: sprin dmar dag gis khebs na /
analyzed: sprin dmar dag gis khebs na /
translated: and is covered by red clouds,

analyzed: de'i tshe pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time an army from another country will come.

original: gang gi tshe nyi ma 'char ba na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe nyi ma 'char ba na /
translated: When the sun rises,

analyzed: gzugs brnyan dag snang ba de'i tshe na 'jigs pa chen po 'ong bar bstan to //
translated: if reflections appear, then it is taught that a great danger will come.

analyzed: de dag gi tshe nyi ma 'char ba dang / nub pa kho na de'i tshe nyi ma mgo bcad pa lta bu'i sprin gyis khebs pa de'i tshe na ;
translated: At that time, when the sun rises and sets, when the sun is covered by clouds as if its head were cut off,

analyzed: yul du 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
translated: at that time, one should know that a great fear will arise in the country.

translated: Again, when the sun rises and sets, when the sun wanders, when the sun falls like a lightning bolt, and when the earth shakes, at that time the king will be killed.

analyzed: yang gal te nyi ma gzugs bu gu can dang / bong bu dang / khrag lta bu'i nyi ma phyed dus gsal bar snang na /

analyzed: mi'i bdag po mtha' dag 'tshe ba dang / nad dang / mu ge dag ldang bas skye bo bas ba'i dus su 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gang gi tshe nyi ma zla ba dag 'khyams zhing du kyil 'khor tha dad du chud la /

analyzed: rtsub par gyur pa de'i tshe ni the tshom med par dmag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

translated: When the sun and moon wander, their orb is not complete, it is rough, it is not in its proper place, and it is defective, then at that time there will be no rising.

translated: Famine and warfare should be understood to occur.🔽When the sun and moon wander like a peacock's neck, then at that time it indicates famine.

original: gang gi tshe nyi ma sprin gyi kha dog lta bu dang / 'ja' 'dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor chung bar gyur pa de'i tshe na 'phral 'phral du char pa 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nyi ma sprin gyi kha dog lta bu dang / 'ja' 'dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor chung bar gyur pa de'i tshe na 'phral 'phral du char pa 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the sun is like the color of a cloud, like a rainbow, and its orb is small, then at that time rain will fall immediately.

original: gang gi tshe nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' rnam gsum 'gal bar gyur pa ni zhag gsum tshun chad char ba 'bab pa dang / zla ba gsum tshun chad du 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' rnam gsum 'gal bar gyur pa ni zhag gsum tshun chad char ba 'bab pa dang / zla ba gsum tshun chad du 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
translated: When the sun, moon, and three planets are in conflict, one should know that rain will fall within three days and a great danger will arise within three months.

translated: When the moon appears as a reflection of the moon in the water, rain will fall within three days and a great danger will arise within one month.

original: gang gi tshe zla ba 'khyams shing ngan du nub par rab tu snang na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zla ba 'khyams shing ngan du nub par rab tu snang na /

original: gza' rnams kyi yang zil gyis non par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gza' rnams kyi yang zil gyis non par 'gyur ro //

original: de bzhin du snang ba chung par gyur pa de'i tshe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du snang ba chung par gyur pa de'i tshe na /
translated: Likewise, when its light diminishes,

original: dmag dpon rnams 'chi bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: dmag dpon rnams 'chi bar 'gyur la /

analyzed: de bzhin du yul de yang lo nyes dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas pa dag kyang 'byung /

analyzed: rgyal po yang 'tshe bar 'gyur ba dang / chom rkun pa dag kyang brgyal bar 'gyur ba'i ltas su bstan to //
translated: It is a sign that the king will be harmed and that the thieves will faint.

analyzed: yang zla ba'i gzugs 'khyams pa dang / gza' rnams phan tshun du mtho zhing zhum par yang gyur pa de ni /

original: lus can rnams shin tu mnar bar 'gyur bar bstan to //
analyzed: lus can rnams shin tu mnar bar 'gyur bar bstan to //
translated: it is a sign that embodied beings will be greatly afflicted.

original: zla ba'i gzugs 'khyams pa na /
analyzed: zla ba'i gzugs 'khyams pa na /
translated: When the form of the moon wanders,

original: gang gi tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe /
translated: at that time,

analyzed: zla ba khrag gi mdog lta bu'i kha dog tu gyur pa de'i tshe na dmag khrag gi 'dam rdzab can 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: when the moon becomes the color of blood, at that time, an army with muddy blood will arise.

original: nyi zla'i ltas kyi le'u ste dang po'o /
analyzed: nyi zla'i ltas kyi le'u ste dang po'o /
translated: This is the first chapter on the omens of the sun and moon.

original: // / gza' skar gyi ltas la drang srong chen po gar ga la legs ldan phyogs kyi skyong ba dag ji ltar gnas pa dang / gza' dang rgyu skar dag gi che chung dang / ji ltar rgyu ba dang / skar ma dag gang nas 'byung zhing ji ltar ltung ba dang /

analyzed: phyogs skyong dag ni bzhi ste /

analyzed: rang gi phyogs la yang dag par brten pa dag @22a * //

analyzed: zla ba ni bcu drug tu brjod do //

analyzed: sgra gcan 'dzin ni nyis 'gyur ro //

original: snar ma dang / gro bzhin dang / rgyal dang / mgo dang / byi bzhin dang / nag pa dang / sa ri dang / sa ga dang / lag dang / snron dang / snrubs dang / nab so dag ste /
analyzed: snar ma dang / gro bzhin dang / rgyal dang / mgo dang / byi bzhin dang / nag pa dang / sa ri dang / sa ga dang / lag dang / snron dang / snrubs dang / nab so dag ste /
translated: aśvinī, bharaṇī, jyeṣṭhā, mūla, āśleṣā, maghā, pūrvāṣāḍhā, uttarāṣāḍhā, śravaṇa, śatabhiṣā, pūrvabhādrapadā, uttarabhādrapadā, and revatī.

original: rgyu skar bcu gnyis pa dag gi dkyil 'khor ni dpag tshad gnyis gnyis so //
analyzed: rgyu skar bcu gnyis pa dag gi dkyil 'khor ni dpag tshad gnyis gnyis so //
translated: The spheres of the twelve houses are two yojanas in diameter.

original: de bzhin du skar ma phra mo gzhan dag gi tshang du rgyang grags tsam mo //
analyzed: de bzhin du skar ma phra mo gzhan dag gi tshang du rgyang grags tsam mo //
translated: The other stars are like a small bird, about one krośa in diameter.

original: de dag gi grangs ni dung phyur phrag gnyis dang / bye ba phrag brgyad dang sa ya phrag ldar bshad de /
analyzed: de dag gi grangs ni dung phyur phrag gnyis dang / bye ba phrag brgyad dang sa ya phrag ldar bshad de /
translated: The total number of stars is explained as 28,288,000,000.

original: rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa dag yin no //
analyzed: rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa dag yin no //
translated: They are located in the sphere of the stars.

original: rgyu skar me bzhi dang / nag pa dang / sa ri dang / sa ga dang / lag dang / de bzhin du mgo dang / nab so dang / sbo rnams ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor yin te /
analyzed: rgyu skar me bzhi dang / nag pa dang / sa ri dang / sa ga dang / lag dang / de bzhin du mgo dang / nab so dang / sbo rnams ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor yin te /
translated: The stars caitra, maghā, pūrvāṣāḍhā, uttarāṣāḍhā, śravaṇa, śatabhiṣā, pūrvabhādrapadā, uttarabhādrapadā, and revatī are in the sphere of wind.

original: de dag dbang ba'i dus su gal te sa ga yo ba dang ser ba 'bab pa dang / sgra gcan 'dzin mthong bar 'gyur pa dang / skar mda' dang / ser ba mi bzad ba 'bab par 'gyur na de'i tshe na rdul gyi char mi zad pa 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: de dag dbang ba'i dus su gal te sa ga yo ba dang ser ba 'bab pa dang / sgra gcan 'dzin mthong bar 'gyur pa dang / skar mda' dang / ser ba mi bzad ba 'bab par 'gyur na de'i tshe na rdul gyi char mi zad pa 'byung ba dang /
translated: If at the time of their influence there is an earthquake, a rain of stones, a sight of Rāhu, a falling star, or an unbearable rain of stones, then at that time an unending rain of dust will occur.

original: de'i tshe rlung dmar ma rungs pa ldang zhing /
analyzed: de'i tshe rlung dmar ma rungs pa ldang zhing /
translated: At that time, a fierce storm will arise.

original: khang bzangs dang / rta babs dang / ba gam dang skyed shing dang / khang pa rnams 'gyel bar byed /
analyzed: khang bzangs dang / rta babs dang / ba gam dang skyed shing dang / khang pa rnams 'gyel bar byed /
translated: It will bring down mansions, archways, parapets, trees, and houses.

original: mtsho chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / rdzing dang / khron pa rnams kyi chu yang skem par byed pa ste /
analyzed: mtsho chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / rdzing dang / khron pa rnams kyi chu yang skem par byed pa ste /
translated: It will dry up the water of great lakes, waterfalls, ponds, and wells.

original: de ltar sngon gyi rig pas rlung las gyur ba'i bye brag tu brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar sngon gyi rig pas rlung las gyur ba'i bye brag tu brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the previous knowledge describes the specific features of the wind.

original: gal te de dag nye bar zhi ba'i rgyu zhag bdun tshun chad char ma bab bar gyur na rlung 'khrugs pa las byung ba'i gnod pa la gzhan dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te de dag nye bar zhi ba'i rgyu zhag bdun tshun chad char ma bab bar gyur na rlung 'khrugs pa las byung ba'i gnod pa la gzhan dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the cause of their pacification is not rain within seven days, then other harms will arise from the disturbance of the wind.

original: yul ma tun da dang / yul ba li ka dang / yul ka tsa da dang / yul kam po dza dang / yul bar bar dang / yul spos 'dzin dang bcas pa dag tu yang 'khrug cing phan tshun mi mthun pa dang / de bzhin du nad dag gis zin pa'i sgra mi snyan pa dang /🔽lus 'phags dag kyang nyen par 'gyur /
analyzed: yul ma tun da dang / yul ba li ka dang / yul ka tsa da dang / yul kam po dza dang / yul bar bar dang / yul spos 'dzin dang bcas pa dag tu yang 'khrug cing phan tshun mi mthun pa dang / de bzhin du nad dag gis zin pa'i sgra mi snyan pa dang / lus 'phags dag kyang nyen par 'gyur /
translated: Likewise, the people of Kuru will be afflicted by disease.

original: mtshon gyis thebs pa dag kyang 'byung /
analyzed: mtshon gyis thebs pa dag kyang 'byung /
translated: They will be struck by weapons.

original: rgyal po rnams la yang dmag 'dren par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: rgyal po rnams la yang dmag 'dren par 'gyur zhing /
translated: They will be led into battle by their kings.

original: de bzhin du ma'i mngal yang 'gags pa dang / sa yang 'bras bu mi skye ba dang / shing thog dang / 'bras bu'i shing dag kyang ngan cing nyung ba dang / dbang pos @22b kyang char pa chen po mi 'bebs pa dang / phyogs thams cad kyi sa'i mdangs kyang sngo gnag tu 'gyur zhing mi gsal ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma'i mngal yang 'gags pa dang / sa yang 'bras bu mi skye ba dang / shing thog dang / 'bras bu'i shing dag kyang ngan cing nyung ba dang / dbang pos @22b kyang char pa chen po mi 'bebs pa dang / phyogs thams cad kyi sa'i mdangs kyang sngo gnag tu 'gyur zhing mi gsal ba dang /
translated: Likewise, the wombs of mothers will be blocked, the earth will not produce fruit, fruit trees will be poor and yield little, the lords of the clouds will not rain much, and the complexion of the earth in all directions will be dark green and dull.

original: rtsub par snang ba dang / ba lang dang / ra lug dang / bya dang / ri dgas dag kyang 'jigs pa med par yang skrag cing 'drog pa dang / phyogs bslad cing phan tshun thob par 'gyur ro //🔽yang rgyu skar sa ga dang / smin drug dang / rgyal dang / khrums stod dang / bha ga'i lha gang yin pa 'di dang / mchu dang / gshin rje'i lha gang yin pa 'di dag dbang ba'i dus su sa g-yos pa'am /
analyzed: rtsub par snang ba dang / ba lang dang / ra lug dang / bya dang / ri dgas dag kyang 'jigs pa med par yang skrag cing 'drog pa dang / phyogs bslad cing phan tshun thob par 'gyur ro // yang rgyu skar sa ga dang / smin drug dang / rgyal dang / khrums stod dang / bha ga'i lha gang yin pa 'di dang / mchu dang / gshin rje'i lha gang yin pa 'di dag dbang ba'i dus su sa g-yos pa'am /
translated: The appearance of the earth is rough, and even cows, goats, sheep, birds, and deer, without fear, are frightened and agitated, and the directions are disturbed and confused with each other.

original: gnam grub pa 'byung bar gyur na me'i phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la bab pa'i shugs kyis gnod pa 'byung bar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: gnam grub pa 'byung bar gyur na me'i phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la bab pa'i shugs kyis gnod pa 'byung bar rig par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, if an earthquake occurs at the time of the influence of these planets, namely, the lunar mansions of Hasta, Anuradha, Pushya, Mrigashira, and Bhadrapada, or these planets, namely, Rahu and Yama, then one should understand that harm will arise by the force of the earthquake falling on the mandala in the direction of fire.

original: mkhris pa'i rigs las gyur gnod pas skye dgu shin tu gzir ba dang / bud med rnams la khrag nad 'byung ba dang / ba dang ma he zho skam pa dang / bsod nams bya bar brtsams shing bsam pa thams cad kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: mkhris pa'i rigs las gyur gnod pas skye dgu shin tu gzir ba dang / bud med rnams la khrag nad 'byung ba dang / ba dang ma he zho skam pa dang / bsod nams bya bar brtsams shing bsam pa thams cad kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur la /
translated: The beings will be oppressed by the harm that arises from the bile type, women will have blood diseases, cows and buffaloes will have dry milk, and all the intentions of those who have begun to make merit will not be accomplished.

original: sems can rnams la yams nad 'byung ba dang / de bzhin du nad dang / rgyal po las kyang gyur ba 'byung ba dang / skye dgu rnams kyang phan tshun dga' ba dag byed nas mi mthun par yang 'gyur zhing nyin mtshan du phyogs rnams su gnas me zhi bar yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: sems can rnams la yams nad 'byung ba dang / de bzhin du nad dang / rgyal po las kyang gyur ba 'byung ba dang / skye dgu rnams kyang phan tshun dga' ba dag byed nas mi mthun par yang 'gyur zhing nyin mtshan du phyogs rnams su gnas me zhi bar yang mi 'gyur /
translated: Plagues will arise for sentient beings, and likewise, diseases and calamities will arise from the king, and the beings who are friends will also become enemies. Day and night, the directions will not be peaceful.

original: sprin yang char pa 'bebs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: sprin yang char pa 'bebs par mi 'gyur /
translated: The clouds will not bring rain.

original: de bzhin du 'dod 'jo dag kyang 'o ma med par 'gyur ba dang / shing ljon pa'i rigs dang / lcug ma dag kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu nyung ba dang / chu'i gnas khron pa dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka la sogs pa yang skam par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dod 'jo dag kyang 'o ma med par 'gyur ba dang / shing ljon pa'i rigs dang / lcug ma dag kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu nyung ba dang / chu'i gnas khron pa dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka la sogs pa yang skam par 'gyur zhing /
translated: In the same way, the wish-granting cows will dry up, the trees and vines will have few flowers and fruits, and the water sources such as wells, ponds, and springs will dry up.

original: mu ge dang nad kyis nyen pa 'byung ba dang / yul 'khrug par yang 'gyur /
analyzed: mu ge dang nad kyis nyen pa 'byung ba dang / yul 'khrug par yang 'gyur /
translated: Famine and disease will occur, and the country will be in turmoil.

original: chom rkun gyi 'jig rten rnams kyi mthu dang ; ri dags rnams kyang 'dren par 'gyur /
analyzed: chom rkun gyi 'jig rten rnams kyi mthu dang ; ri dags rnams kyang 'dren par 'gyur /
translated: The power of the world of thieves will increase, and even the deer will lead them.

original: sha sprang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings rnams dang / de bzhin du rigs ngan gyi rigs dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sha sprang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings rnams dang / de bzhin du rigs ngan gyi rigs dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: The flesh-eating insects, mosquitoes, and likewise the low-caste families will increase.

original: de ltar me'i phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du chos lugs de rnams 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar me'i phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du chos lugs de rnams 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should know that these phenomena will occur in the mandala of the fire direction.

original: khrums smad dang / chu lha dang / de bzhin du nam gru dang / bden bral gyi lha dang / skag dang / de bzhin lag ni chu'i dkyil 'khor yin te /
analyzed: khrums smad dang / chu lha dang / de bzhin du nam gru dang / bden bral gyi lha dang / skag dang / de bzhin lag ni chu'i dkyil 'khor yin te /
translated: Śravaṇa, Śatabhiṣā, Proṣṭha­pada, Revatī, Aśvinī, Bharaṇī, Kṛttikā, Rohiṇī, Mṛgaśiras, Ārdrā, Punarvasu, Puṣya, Āśleṣā, Maghā, Pūrvāṣāḍhā, Uttarāṣāḍhā, Pūrvaproṣṭha­pada, Uttaraproṣṭha­pada, Pūrvābhādrapadā, Uttarābhādrapadā, Pūrvāṣāḍhā, Uttarāṣāḍhā, Śravaṇa, and Śatabhiṣā.

original: de ni bstan bcos rig pa rnams kyis brjod pa yin no //🔽gal te 'dir sa g-yo ba dang / gnam grum pa byung ba dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba yang nye ba'i chags pa dang ldan pa dang / mjug rings dang / de bzhin du ltas su @23a * //
analyzed: de ni bstan bcos rig pa rnams kyis brjod pa yin no // gal te 'dir sa g-yo ba dang / gnam grum pa byung ba dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba yang nye ba'i chags pa dang ldan pa dang / mjug rings dang / de bzhin du ltas su @23a * //
translated: This is what the treatises on astrology say.

original: 'byung ba gzhan mthong bar gyur na chu lha'i de ni skye dgu rnams la dge ba'i rgyu yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'byung ba gzhan mthong bar gyur na chu lha'i de ni skye dgu rnams la dge ba'i rgyu yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: If an earthquake occurs here, or if the sky breaks apart, or if the sun and moon are eclipsed, or if a comet appears, or if any other inauspicious sign is seen, then one should know that this is the cause of good fortune for living beings.

original: der lo legs pa dang / ba 'o ma mang ba nyid du yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: der lo legs pa dang / ba 'o ma mang ba nyid du yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that there will be a good harvest and that the cows will give much milk.

original: bud med dag kyang dus tshang nas tshor ba med par bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bud med dag kyang dus tshang nas tshor ba med par bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Women will give birth easily and without pain at the proper time.

original: sa bon ji ltar btab pa bzhin du grub nas sa yang lo tig gi phreng ba can du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: sa bon ji ltar btab pa bzhin du grub nas sa yang lo tig gi phreng ba can du 'gyur zhing /
translated: The land will be filled with crops and will be adorned with garlands of trees.

original: rgyal po rig pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dag kyang mi dge ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal po rig pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dag kyang mi dge ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The king who follows the Dharma will be free from non-virtue.

original: bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi po yang rang gi las rnams la gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi po yang rang gi las rnams la gnas par 'gyur /
translated: The four castes, such as the Brahmins, will remain in their own occupations.

original: skyad kyis 'tsho ba thams cad kyis kyang rnyed pa'i mchog rnyed par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: skyad kyis 'tsho ba thams cad kyis kyang rnyed pa'i mchog rnyed par 'gyur zhing /
translated: All those who live by their wages will obtain the best wages.

original: sa las skye ba rnams kyang 'bras bu dang / me tog dang 'dab ma dang ldan zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nad med pa dang / skye dgu rnams la yang dge bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa las skye ba rnams kyang 'bras bu dang / me tog dang 'dab ma dang ldan zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nad med pa dang / skye dgu rnams la yang dge bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The crops will be fruitful, full of flowers and leaves, and will increase. There will be happiness, good harvests, and health for all beings.

original: mon gru dang / snar ma dang / snron dang / de bzhin du lha mtshams dang / byi bzhin gro bzhin dang / de bzhin du gzhan yang chu smad ni dbang po chen po'i phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: mon gru dang / snar ma dang / snron dang / de bzhin du lha mtshams dang / byi bzhin gro bzhin dang / de bzhin du gzhan yang chu smad ni dbang po chen po'i phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du rig par bya ste /
translated: and so on, and also the other [signs] such as the great elements, the moon, the sun, and so on.

original: thams cad shin tu phan pa'i rgyu yin zhing skye dgu rnams la bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / rgyal po rnams la dge ba rab tu sbyin par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad shin tu phan pa'i rgyu yin zhing skye dgu rnams la bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / rgyal po rnams la dge ba rab tu sbyin par byed pa yin no //
translated: All of them are causes of great benefit, and they bestow happiness, health, and virtue upon the king.

original: gal te 'dir sa g-yo ba dang / de bzhin du gnam grum pa la sogs pa 'byung ba dang / nyi ma dang zla ba nye ba'i chags pa can du gyur pa dang / mjug rings mthong bar gyur ba dang / gzhan yang glo bur du byung ba gzhan ji ltar 'byung ba yang der ni bstan bcos rig pa'i thub pa rnams kyis mi dge ba med par bstan te /
analyzed: gal te 'dir sa g-yo ba dang / de bzhin du gnam grum pa la sogs pa 'byung ba dang / nyi ma dang zla ba nye ba'i chags pa can du gyur pa dang / mjug rings mthong bar gyur ba dang / gzhan yang glo bur du byung ba gzhan ji ltar 'byung ba yang der ni bstan bcos rig pa'i thub pa rnams kyis mi dge ba med par bstan te /
translated: If there is an earthquake here, or if there is a great storm, or if the sun and moon are eclipsed, or if the comet is seen, or if any other sudden event occurs, then the sages who know the treatises will explain it as inauspicious.

original: lo tog ngag shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang / lo legs pa dang / chom rkun med pa dang / bram ze rnams kyi sbyin sreg dang / mchod sbyin gyi bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: lo tog ngag shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang / lo legs pa dang / chom rkun med pa dang / bram ze rnams kyi sbyin sreg dang / mchod sbyin gyi bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
translated: The crops will be abundant, the harvests good, there will be no thieves, and all the brahmins’ fire sacrifices and sacrificial rites will be accomplished.

original: rig par byed pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyang sa srung bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyang rang gi chos la gzhol zhing /
analyzed: rig par byed pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyang sa srung bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyang rang gi chos la gzhol zhing /
translated: All the kings who perform rites will protect the earth, and the people will be devoted to their own Dharma.

original: sems chos la mngon par dga' ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du char chu 'bab pa dang / shing rnams me tog dang / 'bras bu smin par byed pa dang / skye bo mtha' dag rab tu dga' ba dang / lhags pa rnams phan tshun dga' bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: sems chos la mngon par dga' ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du char chu 'bab pa dang / shing rnams me tog dang / 'bras bu smin par byed pa dang / skye bo mtha' dag rab tu dga' ba dang / lhags pa rnams phan tshun dga' bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: The mind will delight in the Dharma, the rains will fall on time, the trees will bear flowers and fruit, all beings will be happy, and the clouds will gather, bringing joy to all.

original: sprin rnams don med par ma yin te /
analyzed: sprin rnams don med par ma yin te /
translated: The clouds will not be wasted.

original: sa gzhir char pa legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba dang / mi rnams kyi bya @23b ba ji ltar brtsams pa rnams kyang phal cher grub par 'gyur zhing lus can rnams la yang gnod pa byed pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams dang / sbrul dang /
analyzed: sa gzhir char pa legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba dang / mi rnams kyi bya @23b ba ji ltar brtsams pa rnams kyang phal cher grub par 'gyur zhing lus can rnams la yang gnod pa byed pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams dang / sbrul dang /
translated: Rain will fall well on the ground, and most of the activities that people undertake will be accomplished. It will also destroy the harm that is done to embodied beings,🔽as well as ants, snakes,

original: byi ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin du yams kyi nad rnams dang / ba la sogs pa rnams kyang yang dag par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byi ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin du yams kyi nad rnams dang / ba la sogs pa rnams kyang yang dag par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: rats, and so forth, and likewise epidemics and cattle diseases.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na dbang po chen po'i dkyil 'khor dbang bar gyur na chu dang / me dang / rlung las gyur pa bad kan dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nang rnams dang / de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa rnams 'byung ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na dbang po chen po'i dkyil 'khor dbang bar gyur na chu dang / me dang / rlung las gyur pa bad kan dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nang rnams dang / de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa rnams 'byung ste /
translated: Otherwise, if the maṇḍala of the great element is dominant, the internal [ailments] that arise from water, fire, and wind—phlegm, bile,

original: de dag ni gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa bstan to //
analyzed: de dag ni gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa bstan to //
translated: and so forth—will occur, but not otherwise.

original: gza' rnams kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: gza' rnams kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the second chapter, on the planets.

original: // / skar mda'i ltas la skar mda' 'di dag ni de dag ni mtshan ma bstan pa'o //
analyzed: // / skar mda'i ltas la skar mda' 'di dag ni de dag ni mtshan ma bstan pa'o //
translated: The omens of meteors: these meteors are the signs.

original: 'jig rten dag na rtags ston par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten dag na rtags ston par byed pa ste /
translated: They are the omens in the world.

original: de la gang gi tshe dbang po rnams dang chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / me'i phyogs kyi gzhan dag ni kha dog sna tshogs shing gzugs 'jigs pa dang / me stag dang bcas shing 'od dang bcas pa dang / sol ba 'bar ba ltar snang ste /
analyzed: de la gang gi tshe dbang po rnams dang chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / me'i phyogs kyi gzhan dag ni kha dog sna tshogs shing gzugs 'jigs pa dang / me stag dang bcas shing 'od dang bcas pa dang / sol ba 'bar ba ltar snang ste /
translated: When the gods of the sense-sphere, the gods of the realm of the waters, the gods of the wind, the gods of the fire, and the gods of the other directions are of various colors, of terrifying forms, with sparks and flames, appearing like burning coals,

original: nam mkha'i ngos la char du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i ngos la char du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they fall like rain in the sky.

original: gshin rje'i phyogs kyi skar mda' gnag pa dang / dmar po reng red po dang / rtsub pa ni 'jigs par byed pa ste mi'i rgyal po rnams dang / yul rnams la 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gshin rje'i phyogs kyi skar mda' gnag pa dang / dmar po reng red po dang / rtsub pa ni 'jigs par byed pa ste mi'i rgyal po rnams dang / yul rnams la 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar brjod pa yin no //
translated: When the meteors of the direction of Yama are black, red, long, rough, and terrifying, they announce great fear for the kings of men and for the countries.

original: de bzhin du bar snang la 'dug pa dang / ri dang rgya mtsho la 'dug pa yang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du bar snang la 'dug pa dang / ri dang rgya mtsho la 'dug pa yang yin no //
translated: In the same way, they are in the sky, on the mountains and in the oceans.

original: gang du lha yul dang / sa stengs su lhung zhing bzlog phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur na yul der zhi ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du lha yul dang / sa stengs su lhung zhing bzlog phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur na yul der zhi ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: When they fall to the land of the gods or to the earth and move in the opposite direction, then there is no peace in that country.

original: rgyab phyogs su ni rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyab phyogs su ni rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When they move in the opposite direction, then there is always peace.

original: de bzhin du de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad du rgyu ba dang / gzugs 'dod pa 'dzin pa dag yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad du rgyu ba dang / gzugs 'dod pa 'dzin pa dag yin no //
translated: In the same way, they move through all the worlds and take on the form they desire.

original: gnod par gyur pa'i yul dag tu dmag 'gyed du 'jug pa yang byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnod par gyur pa'i yul dag tu dmag 'gyed du 'jug pa yang byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: They also cause war to be waged in countries that are in a state of peace.

original: de'i 'og tu rang bzhin gyis dmag kho nas 'jig rten rnams 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rang bzhin gyis dmag kho nas 'jig rten rnams 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: After that, the worlds are destroyed by war itself.

original: de dag lhung ba dag rjes su mtshan nyid yang dag par rab tu brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag lhung ba dag rjes su mtshan nyid yang dag par rab tu brjod par bya ste /
translated: The characteristics of their fall should be stated.

original: dkar po 'gro zhing me stag dang bcas pa ni bram ze rnams la 'jigs pa 'dren pa yin no //
analyzed: dkar po 'gro zhing me stag dang bcas pa ni bram ze rnams la 'jigs pa 'dren pa yin no //
translated: When they move in a white direction with sparks, they bring fear to the brahmins.

original: de bzhin du dmar po rnams ni rgyal rigs rnams la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dmar po rnams ni rgyal rigs rnams la'o //
translated: In the same way, when they move in a red direction, they bring fear to the kṣatriyas.

original: ser po ni rje'u rigs rnams la'o //
analyzed: ser po ni rje'u rigs rnams la'o //
translated: When they move in a yellow direction, they bring fear to the vaiśyas.

original: nag po dang sngo bskangs ni dmangs rigs rnams la ste /
analyzed: nag po dang sngo bskangs ni dmangs rigs rnams la ste /
translated: The black and dark blue colors are for the śūdra caste.

original: shin tu 'jigs pa 'byung bar brjod do //
analyzed: shin tu 'jigs pa 'byung bar brjod do //
translated: It is said that they bring about very great fear.

original: de bzhin du skar mda' sngo @24a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du skar mda' sngo @24a * //
translated: In the same way, a comet that is pale blue,

original: ba sangs dang / rtsub pa dang / 'grum pa dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me stag dang bcas pa dang / du ba 'thul ba dag tu lhung ba der ni rgyal po la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba sangs dang / rtsub pa dang / 'grum pa dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me stag dang bcas pa dang / du ba 'thul ba dag tu lhung ba der ni rgyal po la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: rough, irregular, white, yellow, of various colors, with sparks, and smoky, falling in those directions, brings harm to the king.

original: gang du la lar phag dang / spre'u dang / wa ltar bcos pa dang ; rig dags dang / bong bu'i gzugs lta bu'i 'od can gyi skar mda' lhung ba der ni rgyal po dang yul 'khor du bcas te 'chi bar 'gyur ba the tshom med do //
analyzed: gang du la lar phag dang / spre'u dang / wa ltar bcos pa dang ; rig dags dang / bong bu'i gzugs lta bu'i 'od can gyi skar mda' lhung ba der ni rgyal po dang yul 'khor du bcas te 'chi bar 'gyur ba the tshom med do //
translated: Wherever a comet falls, shaped like a pig, monkey, or fox, with a glow like a jackal or donkey, there is no doubt that the king and his realm will die.

original: gang rgyu skar dang phrad nas gang mi'i mdun du grum zhing skar mda' grugs pa der ni de nyid du 'bras bur 'gyur par rnam par bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: gang rgyu skar dang phrad nas gang mi'i mdun du grum zhing skar mda' grugs pa der ni de nyid du 'bras bur 'gyur par rnam par bshad par bya'o //
translated: If a comet collides with a lunar mansion and falls in front of a person, grinding and crackling, it should be explained that the result will be right there.

original: gza' dang / rgyu skar gang gi ba lang gi lam dang / rta babs dang / rgyal mtshan khyim du lhung ba de la ni 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gza' dang / rgyu skar gang gi ba lang gi lam dang / rta babs dang / rgyal mtshan khyim du lhung ba de la ni 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar brjod pa yin no //
translated: If a meteor falls in the path of a bull, in a gateway, or in a house, it is said to bring great fear.

original: gang du skar mda' nyi ma la mngon du phyogs te lhung ba ni shin tu 'jigs par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du skar mda' nyi ma la mngon du phyogs te lhung ba ni shin tu 'jigs par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If a meteor falls in the direction of the sun, it causes great terror.

original: ba ba sangs la reg par byed pa de ni der rgyal po la 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba ba sangs la reg par byed pa de ni der rgyal po la 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it touches Venus, there will be danger from the king.

original: gang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la reg pa me lce'i 'od dang mnyam pa'i skar mda' lhung ba de ni rgyal tshab gsod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la reg pa me lce'i 'od dang mnyam pa'i skar mda' lhung ba de ni rgyal tshab gsod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If a meteor falls in the direction of the moon, equal in radiance to a tongue of flame, the heir apparent will be killed.

original: gal te skar mda' lha'i bla ma phur bu la gdud bar byed pa der ni mdun na 'don gsod par 'gyur zhing bram ze'i bdag nyid la yang gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te skar mda' lha'i bla ma phur bu la gdud bar byed pa der ni mdun na 'don gsod par 'gyur zhing bram ze'i bdag nyid la yang gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If a meteor touches Bṛhaspati, the preceptor of the gods, there will be danger to the royal priest and harm to the brahmins.

original: gang gi tshe skar mda' lag la gdung bar byed pa dang / lha lta bu 'byung ba der gzhon nu 'chi bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe skar mda' lag la gdung bar byed pa dang / lha lta bu 'byung ba der gzhon nu 'chi bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: When a meteor strikes the hand, or when there is an appearance like a god, there the prince will die.

original: de'i tshe rgyal po la yang gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe rgyal po la yang gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: And at that time, the king will also be harmed.

original: gang du skar mda' lhung zhing gza' mig dmar la gnod pa byed pa der ni dmag dpon gsod par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang du skar mda' lhung zhing gza' mig dmar la gnod pa byed pa der ni dmag dpon gsod par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Where a meteor falls and Mars does harm, there the general will be killed.

original: mtshon dang me'i 'jigs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽gal te skar mda' 'bab pa nyi ma'i bu spen pa la gnod par byed pa der ni sna bo'i gtso bo dang / tshogs can dag 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshon dang me'i 'jigs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro // gal te skar mda' 'bab pa nyi ma'i bu spen pa la gnod par byed pa der ni sna bo'i gtso bo dang / tshogs can dag 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And there will be the danger of weapons and fire.🔽If a falling meteor harms Saturn, the son of the sun, there the chief of the nose-eaters and the hosts will die.

original: gang gi skye ba'i rgyu skar la skar mda' rtug la gal te zhi bar 'gyur bar mi byed na pho de 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi skye ba'i rgyu skar la skar mda' rtug la gal te zhi bar 'gyur bar mi byed na pho de 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a meteor strikes the birth star and does not make peace, that man will die.

original: tri shang gu dang / bhi ri shi dang / sa ga dang / sa ri dang / skar ma khyi khrid dang / smal bo dang / ri bya dang / de bzhin du bra mta na dhi da ya dang / aa ru na dang / shi shu ma ra dang /
analyzed: tri shang gu dang / bhi ri shi dang / sa ga dang / sa ri dang / skar ma khyi khrid dang / smal bo dang / ri bya dang / de bzhin du bra mta na dhi da ya dang / aa ru na dang / shi shu ma ra dang /
translated: Triśaṅku, Bhīṣma, Śakuni, Śarī, Kṛttikā, Śravaṇa, Śravaṇa, Śiśumāra,

original: sme'u bdun dang / de bzhin du gung tshigs kyis khebs shing skar mda' lhung ba de shin tu 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: sme'u bdun dang / de bzhin du gung tshigs kyis khebs shing skar mda' lhung ba de shin tu 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: and so on, and the seven rāśis, and likewise the lunar mansions that cover the meridian and the falling of meteors, are very fearful.

original: dmag mang @24b pos 'khrug pa dang / mtshon gyis 'tshe ba yang rab tu zad par byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: dmag mang @24b pos 'khrug pa dang / mtshon gyis 'tshe ba yang rab tu zad par byed par 'gyur /
translated: They will bring about the destruction of great battles and the harm of weapons.

original: de'i tshe yul 'jigs par byed pa'i chom rkun la sogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe yul 'jigs par byed pa'i chom rkun la sogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, there will also be the appearance of terrifying thieves and so on in the country.

original: gang du skar mda' rab tu 'bar ba sa la thur du thad kar 'jug pa de'i tshe ni dgra dag gis rgyal po gsod par 'gyur zhing yul 'jigs par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du skar mda' rab tu 'bar ba sa la thur du thad kar 'jug pa de'i tshe ni dgra dag gis rgyal po gsod par 'gyur zhing yul 'jigs par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: When a meteor blazes and falls straight down to the ground, at that time enemies will kill the king and the country will be terrified.

original: skar mda' rta'i dbyibs lta bu ni rgyal po'i dmag la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skar mda' rta'i dbyibs lta bu ni rgyal po'i dmag la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is shaped like a horse, it will harm the king's army.

original: ral gri dang / rtse gsum dang / kha tv'am ga'i dbyibs lta bu ni yul dang rgyal por bcas pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ral gri dang / rtse gsum dang / kha tv'am ga'i dbyibs lta bu ni yul dang rgyal por bcas pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is shaped like a sword, a trident, or a battle-ax, it will harm the country and the king.

original: skar mda' chen po gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / shing rta'i rnam pa dag tu sa la ltung ba ni zhag bdun gyi dmag dang rgyal por bcas pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //🔽gang gi tshe sa la skar mda'i char pa dang / rdo'i char ba chen po dag bab pa de'i tshe ni dmag stong gi khrag sas 'thung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skar mda' chen po gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / shing rta'i rnam pa dag tu sa la ltung ba ni zhag bdun gyi dmag dang rgyal por bcas pa la gnod par 'gyur ro // gang gi tshe sa la skar mda'i char pa dang / rdo'i char ba chen po dag bab pa de'i tshe ni dmag stong gi khrag sas 'thung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a large meteor falls to the ground in the form of a parasol, victory banner, or chariot, it will harm the army and the king for seven days.🔽When a rain of meteors and a great rain of stones falls to the ground, the army will drink the blood of a thousand men.

original: gang gi tshe skar mda' me'i kha dog lta bu gnam grum pa dang bcas te sa steng du lhung ba de'i tshe ni dmag mi stong gi khrag sas 'thung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe skar mda' me'i kha dog lta bu gnam grum pa dang bcas te sa steng du lhung ba de'i tshe ni dmag mi stong gi khrag sas 'thung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When a meteor the color of fire falls to the ground with a rumble, the army will drink the blood of a thousand men.

original: gang du glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta'i gzugs lta bu'i 'od dang / ri lta bu'i rnam pa dag thur du lhung ba ni yul dang / rgyal po dang bcas pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta'i gzugs lta bu'i 'od dang / ri lta bu'i rnam pa dag thur du lhung ba ni yul dang / rgyal po dang bcas pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: When lights in the form of elephants, horses, and chariots and forms like mountains fall to the ground, this is an omen of harm to the country and the king.

original: gang gi tshe skar mda' dus tshigs snga ma kun du phrad pa du ba lta bu sa la thur du lhung ba de'i tshe ni rgyal po gsod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe skar mda' dus tshigs snga ma kun du phrad pa du ba lta bu sa la thur du lhung ba de'i tshe ni rgyal po gsod par 'gyur ro //
translated: When a meteor falls to the ground like smoke at the end of the previous season, this is an omen of the death of the king.

original: dus tshigs kyi phyi ma la brten pa'i skar mda' me lta bu lhung ba ni mchod sbyin byed pa rnams 'chi zhing /
analyzed: dus tshigs kyi phyi ma la brten pa'i skar mda' me lta bu lhung ba ni mchod sbyin byed pa rnams 'chi zhing /
translated: When a meteor falls like fire at the end of the season, this is an omen of the death of those who perform sacrifices.

original: de bzhin du mchod sbyin gyi las rnams 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du mchod sbyin gyi las rnams 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, it is an omen of the destruction of sacrificial rites.

original: gang gi tshe skar mda'i sgra chen pos rab tu rgyug cing yul yul dang / grong grod du lhung ba de'i tshe ni rtag tu rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe skar mda'i sgra chen pos rab tu rgyug cing yul yul dang / grong grod du lhung ba de'i tshe ni rtag tu rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When the sound of a meteor runs through the country and falls to the ground in a village, this is an omen of the death of the king.

original: shar gyi phyogs char kun du 'byung zhing nyi ma'i lam la brten te nub tu kha bltas shing song nas yul ma ga dh'ar phyin te /
analyzed: shar gyi phyogs char kun du 'byung zhing nyi ma'i lam la brten te nub tu kha bltas shing song nas yul ma ga dh'ar phyin te /
translated: It arises in the eastern direction, and having reached the sun's path, it moves toward the west and arrives in the land of Magadha.

original: grum pa ni lo tog rnams smin na yang lo nyes dang / de bzhin du mi ngas 'byung bar yang 'gyur zhing 'jig rten rnams la rang gi mi mthun pa las 'gyur ba'i dmag kyang 'byung bar bshad do //
analyzed: grum pa ni lo tog rnams smin na yang lo nyes dang / de bzhin du mi ngas 'byung bar yang 'gyur zhing 'jig rten rnams la rang gi mi mthun pa las 'gyur ba'i dmag kyang 'byung bar bshad do //
translated: It is said that when the crops ripen, there will be famine and war, and armies will appear in the world to fight against their own people.

original: rgyal po rnams dang khyim khol 'byor ba'i mi rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyal po rnams dang khyim khol 'byor ba'i mi rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur te /
translated: Kings and wealthy householders will die.

original: 'jig rten la gnod par byed pa nyes pa rnam pa mang po de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten la gnod par byed pa nyes pa rnam pa mang po de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Many such calamities will befall the world.

original: gang du me tog kunda dang zla ba dang / dngul gyi 'do lta bu'i skar mda' lhung ba @25a * //
analyzed: gang du me tog kunda dang zla ba dang / dngul gyi 'do lta bu'i skar mda' lhung ba @25a * //
translated: When a star like a jasmine flower, the moon, or a silver bird falls,

original: dang ; rgyal po rnams rgyal ba dang / lo legs pa dang / bde bar byed pa smra bar byed do //
analyzed: dang ; rgyal po rnams rgyal ba dang / lo legs pa dang / bde bar byed pa smra bar byed do //
translated: it is said that kings will be victorious, crops will be good, and happiness will prevail.

original: skar mda' chen po kha dog rab tu 'bar ba shin tu snum pa dang dngul dang / shel gyi 'od 'dra ba ni char pa 'bab par smra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: skar mda' chen po kha dog rab tu 'bar ba shin tu snum pa dang dngul dang / shel gyi 'od 'dra ba ni char pa 'bab par smra bar 'gyur te /
translated: If a great meteor, blazing with light, very oily, and like the color of silver or crystal, falls, it is said to bring rain.

original: 'di la the tshom med do //
analyzed: 'di la the tshom med do //
translated: There is no doubt about this.

original: gang du skar mda' chen po du ba dang bcas pa gzugs 'dzin par byed pa me stag dang bcas pa sol ba'i mdog lta bu byung ba de'i tshe ni rgyal po la 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du skar mda' chen po du ba dang bcas pa gzugs 'dzin par byed pa me stag dang bcas pa sol ba'i mdog lta bu byung ba de'i tshe ni rgyal po la 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When a great meteor with smoke, holding a form, with sparks, and the color of charcoal appears, at that time there will be a great danger for the king.

original: du ba'i mdog lta bu dang / che ba dang / skar ma ltar dag pa dang / g-yas g-yon du so sor 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / bee d'u rya'i mdog lta bu dang / shel gyi 'od lta bu dang / gser gyi mdog lta bu dang /
analyzed: du ba'i mdog lta bu dang / che ba dang / skar ma ltar dag pa dang / g-yas g-yon du so sor 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / bee d'u rya'i mdog lta bu dang / shel gyi 'od lta bu dang / gser gyi mdog lta bu dang /
translated: If a meteor the color of smoke, large, pure like a star, moving separately to the right and left, the color of beryl, the color of crystal, the color of gold,

original: dngul lta bu dang / zla ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar ba dang / zho'i 'od dang 'dra ba'i skar mda' de ni lo legs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngul lta bu dang / zla ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar ba dang / zho'i 'od dang 'dra ba'i skar mda' de ni lo legs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the color of silver, white like the light of the moon, or the color of curd, falls, that year will be good.

original: rgyal po rgyal bar 'gyur ba thub pa snga ma rnams kyis rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: rgyal po rgyal bar 'gyur ba thub pa snga ma rnams kyis rab tu bstan to //
translated: The ancient sages have taught that the king will be victorious.

original: bee d'u rya'i mdog lta bur bstan pa ni char pa 'bab par brjod do //
analyzed: bee d'u rya'i mdog lta bur bstan pa ni char pa 'bab par brjod do //
translated: If the color of the cloud is like beryl, it is said that rain will fall.

original: shel lta bur gyur na ni lo legs par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: shel lta bur gyur na ni lo legs par 'gyur ro /
translated: If it is like crystal, there will be a good harvest.

original: gser gyi 'od lta bu gyur na ni mes 'khrug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gser gyi 'od lta bu gyur na ni mes 'khrug par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is like the color of gold, there will be a fire disturbance.

original: dmar por gyur na ni dmag 'byung bar brjod do //🔽'di skad du gang bstan pa ni zla ba gnyis ma lus par de'i rnam par smin par 'gyur brjod do //
analyzed: dmar por gyur na ni dmag 'byung bar brjod do // 'di skad du gang bstan pa ni zla ba gnyis ma lus par de'i rnam par smin par 'gyur brjod do //
translated: If it is red, it is said that an army will appear.🔽It is said that whatever is taught will be the complete ripening of that.

original: skar mda'i ltas te le'u gsum pa'o /
analyzed: skar mda'i ltas te le'u gsum pa'o /
translated: This concludes the third chapter on the omens of meteors.

original: // / sprin dang / glog dang / 'ja' 'od kyi ltas la gang gi tshe sprin gyi gzugs g-yung drung 'khyil pa lta bu dang / gdugs dang / lteng ka dang / shing rta bsreg pa bkra shis pa dang ldan pa'i dbyibs dang / ri lta bu dag ni skye dgu bde bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: // / sprin dang / glog dang / 'ja' 'od kyi ltas la gang gi tshe sprin gyi gzugs g-yung drung 'khyil pa lta bu dang / gdugs dang / lteng ka dang / shing rta bsreg pa bkra shis pa dang ldan pa'i dbyibs dang / ri lta bu dag ni skye dgu bde bar byed pa'o //
translated: The omens of clouds, lightning, and rainbows: When the form of the cloud is like a svastika, an umbrella, a pond, or a cart, with an auspicious shape, or like a mountain, it brings happiness to all beings.

original: de bzhin du dbang po'i mtshon cha'i rnam pa lta bu dag dang / dbyig pa lta bu dag ni bde bar yang mi byed la /🔽mu ge yang ston par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po'i mtshon cha'i rnam pa lta bu dag dang / dbyig pa lta bu dag ni bde bar yang mi byed la / mu ge yang ston par byed do //
translated: they do not bring happiness, but rather famine.

original: gang gi tshe dbyar gyi dus su sprin mdung thung dang / gsal shing dang dpa' rlabs lta bu dag dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan lta bu dag dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs lta bur snang ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dbyar gyi dus su sprin mdung thung dang / gsal shing dang dpa' rlabs lta bu dag dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan lta bu dag dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs lta bur snang ba de'i tshe /
translated: When the clouds are like spears, like arrows, like lances, like banners, like flags, like various weapons,

original: dmag khrag gi 'dam rdza ba can mi bzad pa 'byung la lo tog kyang chud zos bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dmag khrag gi 'dam rdza ba can mi bzad pa 'byung la lo tog kyang chud zos bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: then a terrible war will break out, the harvest will be bad,

original: chom rkun dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chom rkun dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and brigands will become numerous.🔽When the clouds are shaped like a cut, like a dry tree, like a pestle, like a skull,

original: sprin tha dad du chad pa dang / shing skam lta bu dang / gtun shin lta bu dang / mgo thod lta bu'i dbyibs gang yin pa de dag ni mod la 'jigs pa'i @25b dmag 'ong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sprin tha dad du chad pa dang / shing skam lta bu dang / gtun shin lta bu dang / mgo thod lta bu'i dbyibs gang yin pa de dag ni mod la 'jigs pa'i @25b dmag 'ong par 'gyur ro //
translated: then an army will come quickly to cause fear.

original: yang sprin bya sna tshogs lta bu dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu'i sprin gyi tshogs dag nyi ma shar ba dang nub pa kho na'i tshe nyi ma'i zur nas 'gro bar gyur na de ni skye bo zad par 'gyur ba'i nad dang / mtshon la sogs pa 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang sprin bya sna tshogs lta bu dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu'i sprin gyi tshogs dag nyi ma shar ba dang nub pa kho na'i tshe nyi ma'i zur nas 'gro bar gyur na de ni skye bo zad par 'gyur ba'i nad dang / mtshon la sogs pa 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Again, when masses of clouds like various birds, or like clouds of camels and donkeys, move from the edge of the sun only at sunrise and sunset, one should know that this is a sign of the exhaustion of people's lives, of disease, war, and so on.

original: yang sprin gyi gzugs 'gog pa can lta bur gyur cig / rdul gyi tshogs 'dren par byed pa'i rlung drag po dang bcas pa 'byung ba ni rgyal po dang skye bo phal pa dag 'chi ba dang / yul 'khor dang / dgon pa na gnas pa dag la gnod par bstan to //
analyzed: yang sprin gyi gzugs 'gog pa can lta bur gyur cig / rdul gyi tshogs 'dren par byed pa'i rlung drag po dang bcas pa 'byung ba ni rgyal po dang skye bo phal pa dag 'chi ba dang / yul 'khor dang / dgon pa na gnas pa dag la gnod par bstan to //
translated: Again, when a cloud-like form stops, and a strong wind arises that drives away the mass of dust, this indicates harm to the king and ordinary people, and harm to the country and those living in the wilderness.

original: nam mkha' la sprin med par 'brug zer ba dang / 'brug zer la char med pa'i sprin ni gnod pa 'byung ba'i sprin yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' la sprin med par 'brug zer ba dang / 'brug zer la char med pa'i sprin ni gnod pa 'byung ba'i sprin yin no //
translated: A cloud that thunders without rain, or thunders and rains without clouds, is a cloud of harm.

original: 'od glog dang 'ja' rlung gi ltas la gang gi tshe nyi ma'i drung lho phyogs ngos nas glog 'byung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'od glog dang 'ja' rlung gi ltas la gang gi tshe nyi ma'i drung lho phyogs ngos nas glog 'byung bar 'gyur la /
translated: When lightning and rainbows appear in the southern direction of the sun,

original: de'i dus su rgyal po'i pho brang dang / rta babs dang / glang po che dang / rta'i bres kyi khang steng dang / rgyal po'i lam dang / khrom lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / grong khyer gyi sgo dang ; shing chen po rnams la thog dang ser ba 'bab pa'am /
analyzed: de'i dus su rgyal po'i pho brang dang / rta babs dang / glang po che dang / rta'i bres kyi khang steng dang / rgyal po'i lam dang / khrom lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / grong khyer gyi sgo dang ; shing chen po rnams la thog dang ser ba 'bab pa'am /
translated: at that time, lightning and hail will fall on the king's palace, on the archways, on the elephant and horse stables, on the king's road, on the crossroads of the marketplace, on the city gates, and on the great trees.

original: skar mda' dag kyang lhung bar gyur na der lo gcig tshun tshad du 'jig rten kun du zad par 'gyur bar rig par bya zhing /
analyzed: skar mda' dag kyang lhung bar gyur na der lo gcig tshun tshad du 'jig rten kun du zad par 'gyur bar rig par bya zhing /
translated: If meteors fall there, it should be known that within one year the whole world will be destroyed.

original: yul der rgyal po gzhan 'ong bar yang the tshom med do //
analyzed: yul der rgyal po gzhan 'ong bar yang the tshom med do //
translated: And there is no doubt that another king will come to that country.

original: nyi ma la 'byung ba'i glog de nyid rgyal po'i rta babs dang / pho brang gi sgor bab na rgyal po dang / de la brten pa dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur /
analyzed: nyi ma la 'byung ba'i glog de nyid rgyal po'i rta babs dang / pho brang gi sgor bab na rgyal po dang / de la brten pa dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur /
translated: If that lightning that appears in the sun falls on the king's archway and palace gate, the king and those who depend on him will die.

original: rta bres dang glang po che'i bres su bab na de'i srung ma nges par 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rta bres dang glang po che'i bres su bab na de'i srung ma nges par 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it falls into a horse trough or an elephant trough, the guardians of those [animals] will certainly be frightened.

original: ra bar babs na dmag mi'i gtso bo dag 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ra bar babs na dmag mi'i gtso bo dag 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it falls into a moat, the chief soldiers will die.

original: gang gi tshe me'i phyogs nas glog 'od me lta bu 'byung ba ni nad rnams kyis 'khrug pa dang / rlung drag pos gnod pa 'byung ba'i ltas yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe me'i phyogs nas glog 'od me lta bu 'byung ba ni nad rnams kyis 'khrug pa dang / rlung drag pos gnod pa 'byung ba'i ltas yin no //
translated: When lightning with a fire-like light appears from the direction of fire, it is a sign of disturbances by diseases and harm from strong winds.

original: bden bral gyi phyogs nas glog 'byung bar byed pa de'i tshe ni rlung dal ba 'byung bar byed cing nad kyis 'jig rten zad par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bden bral gyi phyogs nas glog 'byung bar byed pa de'i tshe ni rlung dal ba 'byung bar byed cing nad kyis 'jig rten zad par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: When lightning appears from the direction of the fire-free [quarter], at that time slow winds arise and the world will be destroyed by disease.

original: gang gi tshe nam mkha' sprin med par phyogs dag tu rtag par glog 'byung bar 'gyur ba der ni rgyal po 'chi ba dang / yul 'khor dang bcas pa 'jigs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nam mkha' sprin med par phyogs dag tu rtag par glog 'byung bar 'gyur ba der ni rgyal po 'chi ba dang / yul 'khor dang bcas pa 'jigs par byed pa'o //
translated: When lightning constantly appears in the directions in a cloudless sky, there will be the death of the king and destruction of the country and its people.

original: gang gi tshe glog me tog gi 'bras bur mdzes shing snum pa'i 'od can sprin gyi dbus na 'dug pa ni bde ba dang lo legs par 'gyur bar bstan no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe glog me tog gi 'bras bur mdzes shing snum pa'i 'od can sprin gyi dbus na 'dug pa ni bde ba dang lo legs par 'gyur bar bstan no //
translated: When lightning is beautiful, with the luster of a flower, in the midst of clouds, it shows happiness and good harvests.

original: 'ja' ltas la gang gi tshe gzhan dag gis grong khyer bskor ba na 'ja' 'byung bar @26a * //
analyzed: 'ja' ltas la gang gi tshe gzhan dag gis grong khyer bskor ba na 'ja' 'byung bar @26a * //
translated: When rainbows appear when other cities are besieged,

original: gyur na grong de nyid 'jigs cing 'jig pa chen po nye bar gnas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gyur na grong de nyid 'jigs cing 'jig pa chen po nye bar gnas par rig par bya'o //
translated: one should know that that very city is in danger and that a great destruction is imminent.

original: yang gang dag tu dmag gis grong khyer bskor ba na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'jas khebs par gyur na de las ser ba 'jigs pa 'byung ba dang dmag tshogs de las kyang gtso bo 'chi bar gyur pa ston to //
analyzed: yang gang dag tu dmag gis grong khyer bskor ba na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'jas khebs par gyur na de las ser ba 'jigs pa 'byung ba dang dmag tshogs de las kyang gtso bo 'chi bar gyur pa ston to //
translated: Moreover, when the orb of the sun is covered by a rainbow when a city is besieged by an army, it shows the danger of hail and that the leader of that army will die.

original: gang gi tshe dmag gi g-yul shom zhing go cha gyon pa na 'ja' nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mnyam par gyur pa ni //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dmag gi g-yul shom zhing go cha gyon pa na 'ja' nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mnyam par gyur pa ni //
translated: When a rainbow is equal to the orb of the sun when an army is preparing for battle and putting on armor,

original: de ni phyogs gnyi ga 'chi ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni phyogs gnyi ga 'chi ba yin no //
translated: that is the death of both sides.

original: gang dag tu dmag 'gyed pa'i g-yul du zhugs pa na mdun nam g-yas nas 'ja' 'byung ba ni de dag gsod par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: gang dag tu dmag 'gyed pa'i g-yul du zhugs pa na mdun nam g-yas nas 'ja' 'byung ba ni de dag gsod par ston pa yin no //
translated: When rainbows appear in the direction of the battle, in front or to the right, this indicates that they will be killed.

original: dbyar ka 'ja' 'khyil pa mang ba dang / sa g-yo ba dang / zla brnyan dag byung ba de'i tshe pha rol gzhan gyi 'jigs pa dag 'byung bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: dbyar ka 'ja' 'khyil pa mang ba dang / sa g-yo ba dang / zla brnyan dag byung ba de'i tshe pha rol gzhan gyi 'jigs pa dag 'byung bar byed pa'o //
translated: When there are many rainbows in the summer, earthquakes, and lunar eclipses, this causes fear of others.

original: gang dag tu mtshan mo 'ja' nam mkha' la mngon par byung na de ni dge ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang dag tu mtshan mo 'ja' nam mkha' la mngon par byung na de ni dge ba ma yin te /
translated: When rainbows appear in the sky at night, this is not virtuous.

original: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba dang / yul 'khrug cing rgyal po 'chi ba dang / yang na rgyal po sma 'bab pa la sogs pas ston pas na dbang po mchod pa bde legs su 'gyur ba'i cho ga byas nas yul de nas gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba dang / yul 'khrug cing rgyal po 'chi ba dang / yang na rgyal po sma 'bab pa la sogs pas ston pas na dbang po mchod pa bde legs su 'gyur ba'i cho ga byas nas yul de nas gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: This indicates that the armies of others will come, the country will be disturbed, the king will die, or the king will be disgraced, and so on. Therefore, having performed the rite of worshipping the senses for the sake of well-being, one should go elsewhere.

original: gang gi tshe mtshan mo nam mkha' la 'ja' kha dog ngan cing shin tu che la ri mo gsum 'byung ba de'i tshe rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor rnams la myur du 'jigs pa 'byung zhing gzhan gyi dmag tshogs dag gis kyang 'chi bar 'gyur bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe mtshan mo nam mkha' la 'ja' kha dog ngan cing shin tu che la ri mo gsum 'byung ba de'i tshe rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor rnams la myur du 'jigs pa 'byung zhing gzhan gyi dmag tshogs dag gis kyang 'chi bar 'gyur bar ston pa'o //
translated: When at night a rainbow appears in the sky, with bad colors, very large, and with three bands, then it shows that the royal circles will quickly have danger and will be destroyed by the armies of others.

original: gang gi tshe 'phral du nye bar sprul pa'i 'ja' rtags mthong na de'i grong khyer 'jig pa dang / yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'phral du nye bar sprul pa'i 'ja' rtags mthong na de'i grong khyer 'jig pa dang / yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
translated: When one sees the signs of a rainbow suddenly manifested, one should know that the city will be destroyed and the country will be destroyed.

original: 'od ltas la gang gi tshe nam mkha' la 'od kyi rnam pa gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / shing rta'i rnam pa dag dang 'khor lo dang / dung la sogs pa bkra shis kyi mtshan mar bya ba dag dang / 'od ral gri dang /
analyzed: 'od ltas la gang gi tshe nam mkha' la 'od kyi rnam pa gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / shing rta'i rnam pa dag dang 'khor lo dang / dung la sogs pa bkra shis kyi mtshan mar bya ba dag dang / 'od ral gri dang /
translated: As for the light omens, when in the sky there appear forms of light like parasols, victory banners, and chariots, and wheels, conches, and so forth, which are considered to be auspicious signs, and lights in the shapes of swords

original: padma'i dbyibs kyi rnam pa dag 'byung ba ni rgyal po rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur bar bstan to //
analyzed: padma'i dbyibs kyi rnam pa dag 'byung ba ni rgyal po rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur bar bstan to //
translated: and lotuses, it shows that the king will be victorious.

original: yang gang du 'od kyi rnam pa mgo thod lta bu dang / dbyig tho dang / gtun shing dang / sgrog rus lta bur snang ba dag gis ni rgyal po dang bcas pa'i yul 'jigs par bstan to //
analyzed: yang gang du 'od kyi rnam pa mgo thod lta bu dang / dbyig tho dang / gtun shing dang / sgrog rus lta bur snang ba dag gis ni rgyal po dang bcas pa'i yul 'jigs par bstan to //
translated: Moreover, wherever the forms of light appear like a head ornament, a mace, a pestle, or a collar bone, they indicate fear for the country with its king.

original: yang gang du 'od kyi rnam pa mgo thod lta bu dang / dbyig tho dang / nya dang rus sbal 'dra ba dang / de bzhin du sbal pa dang / nya phyis dang / chu srin lta bu dag gis kyang 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar ston to //
analyzed: yang gang du 'od kyi rnam pa mgo thod lta bu dang / dbyig tho dang / nya dang rus sbal 'dra ba dang / de bzhin du sbal pa dang / nya phyis dang / chu srin lta bu dag gis kyang 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar ston to //
translated: Moreover, wherever the forms of light appear like a head ornament, a mace, a fish, a turtle, and likewise a frog, a cuttlefish, or a crocodile, they indicate the arising of great fear.

original: sprin glog dang 'ja' 'od la @26b sogs pa'i ltas kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: sprin glog dang 'ja' 'od la @26b sogs pa'i ltas kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
translated: This is the fourth chapter on the omens of clouds, lightning, rainbows, and so forth.

original: // / phyogs cha brgyad po dag nas 'brug glog la sogs pa 'byung ba'i ltas la shar phyogs la sogs pa phyogs cha brgyad po dag nas 'brug glog la sogs pa zer ba las dge 'dun gyi ltas su blta ba ni /
analyzed: // / phyogs cha brgyad po dag nas 'brug glog la sogs pa 'byung ba'i ltas la shar phyogs la sogs pa phyogs cha brgyad po dag nas 'brug glog la sogs pa zer ba las dge 'dun gyi ltas su blta ba ni /
translated: The omens of the Saṅgha are the sounds of thunder, lightning, and so forth that occur in the eight directions. The eight directions, such as the east, are as follows.

original: sos dang po dbyar zla 'bring po nya la dbang po'i phyogs kyi gnas su 'brug zer ba thos shing de nyid du rlung byung na de'i tshe ni chu chen po dang / char 'bab par 'gyur zhing lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang / skye dgu dag dang /
analyzed: sos dang po dbyar zla 'bring po nya la dbang po'i phyogs kyi gnas su 'brug zer ba thos shing de nyid du rlung byung na de'i tshe ni chu chen po dang / char 'bab par 'gyur zhing lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang / skye dgu dag dang /
translated: If in the first spring month, the middle summer month, or the middle autumn month, thunder is heard in the direction of the sense faculties and wind arises in that direction, then at that time there will be great floods and rain, good harvests, happiness, and the people will be healthy.

original: rgyal po la nad med par 'gyur zhing sngon gyi bstan bcos rig pa rnams kyis brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyal po la nad med par 'gyur zhing sngon gyi bstan bcos rig pa rnams kyis brjod pa yin no //
translated: The king will be free from illness. This is stated in the treatises of the past.

original: de bzhin du dbyar zla 'bring po zhes kun la yang sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbyar zla 'bring po zhes kun la yang sbyar te /
translated: Similarly, apply this to all the middle months of summer and so on.

original: me'i phyogs cha nas gal te glog 'byung zhing rlung yang 'byung bar 'gyur na de'i tshe me'i 'jigs pa 'byung zhing lo nyes pa dang / mi ngas dang / de bzhin du chom rkun gyi gnod pa dang / rgyal po la mi dge ba dang /
analyzed: me'i phyogs cha nas gal te glog 'byung zhing rlung yang 'byung bar 'gyur na de'i tshe me'i 'jigs pa 'byung zhing lo nyes pa dang / mi ngas dang / de bzhin du chom rkun gyi gnod pa dang / rgyal po la mi dge ba dang /
translated: If lightning occurs and wind arises in the direction of fire, then at that time there will be the danger of fire, crop failure, famine, and likewise the harm of thieves, misfortune for the king,

original: nad kyis bslongs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nad kyis bslongs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: and the king will be afflicted by illness.

original: gshin rje'i phyogs su gal te glog dang / rlung dang po 'byung bar 'gyur na de'i tshe ni rgyal po dang chom rkun gyi gnod pa dang / me dag dang / nad dag gi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas dang / mi rnams phan tshun gsod pa dang /
analyzed: gshin rje'i phyogs su gal te glog dang / rlung dang po 'byung bar 'gyur na de'i tshe ni rgyal po dang chom rkun gyi gnod pa dang / me dag dang / nad dag gi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas dang / mi rnams phan tshun gsod pa dang /
translated: If lightning and wind occur in the direction of Yama, then there will be harm from kings and thieves, danger from fire and disease, famine, war, and people killing each other.

original: 'jig rten la gnod par byed pa spyang ki dang / stag las gyur pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten la gnod par byed pa spyang ki dang / stag las gyur pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: There will be harm to the world from wolves and tigers.

original: bden bral gyi phyogs su gang gi tshe glog dang / rlung 'byung zhing sprin dag kyang snang la /
analyzed: bden bral gyi phyogs su gang gi tshe glog dang / rlung 'byung zhing sprin dag kyang snang la /
translated: If lightning and wind occur in the direction of Nirṛti, and clouds appear,

original: 'brug sgra yang grag na dbang pos char chung du 'bebs par byed cing /
analyzed: 'brug sgra yang grag na dbang pos char chung du 'bebs par byed cing /
translated: and if there is also the sound of thunder, Indra will cause little rain.

original: lo tog dag kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur //
analyzed: lo tog dag kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur //
translated: And crops will not grow.

original: byi ba dang bye ba la sogs pa dag kyang kun nas 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byi ba dang bye ba la sogs pa dag kyang kun nas 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: Mice, birds, and so on will also descend.

original: chu lha'i phyogs su gang gi tshe glog dang rlung 'byung zhing //
analyzed: chu lha'i phyogs su gang gi tshe glog dang rlung 'byung zhing //
translated: If lightning and wind occur in the direction of Varuṇa,🔽and if there is the sound of thunder,🔽then there will be much rain.

original: 'brug sgra yang grag pa de'i tshe ni char pa chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: 'brug sgra yang grag pa de'i tshe ni char pa chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing //
translated: When there is thunder, it rains heavily.

original: lo tog thams cad smin pa dang / lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang / skye dgu rnams na med pa nyid dang / de bzhin du chos kyi 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lo tog thams cad smin pa dang / lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang / skye dgu rnams na med pa nyid dang / de bzhin du chos kyi 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: All crops ripen, there is an excellent harvest, happiness, and no disease among the people.

original: rlung gi phyogs su gang gi tshe glog dang rlung byung na rlung chen pos nyams pa'i char mi 'bab pa dang / lo tog skye ba yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs su gang gi tshe glog dang rlung byung na rlung chen pos nyams pa'i char mi 'bab pa dang / lo tog skye ba yang mi 'gyur /
translated: When lightning and wind occur in the direction of the wind, there is no rain to destroy the crops, and the crops do not grow.

original: rlung nad rnams kyang 'byung zhing de bzhin du mi nad rnams kyang 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten la gnod par byed pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes rnam par bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rlung nad rnams kyang 'byung zhing de bzhin du mi nad rnams kyang 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten la gnod par byed pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes rnam par bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: There are wind diseases, and likewise, there are diseases of the people, and all calamities for the world occur.

original: ku be ra'i phyogs nas gang @27a * //
analyzed: ku be ra'i phyogs nas gang @27a * //
translated: From the direction of Kubera,

original: gi tshe glog dang rlung byung ba de'i tshe dbang pos zla ba bzhin du rtag tu char 'bebs shing 'bru la sogs pa lo tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rgyal po rang gi chos kho nas gnas shing chos dang ldan pa dang /
analyzed: gi tshe glog dang rlung byung ba de'i tshe dbang pos zla ba bzhin du rtag tu char 'bebs shing 'bru la sogs pa lo tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rgyal po rang gi chos kho nas gnas shing chos dang ldan pa dang /
translated: When lightning and wind occur in the east, the king will always rain like the moon and crops such as grain will be abundant, flowers, fruit and so on will be abundant, the king will abide by his own Dharma and possess Dharma.

original: skye dgu thams cad chos la dga' zhing phan tshun phan par 'dod pa la dga' rangs pa dang / ba dang bzhon rnams kyang 'o ma mang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye dgu thams cad chos la dga' zhing phan tshun phan par 'dod pa la dga' rangs pa dang / ba dang bzhon rnams kyang 'o ma mang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All beings will delight in Dharma and delight in wishing to benefit each other and milk and mounts will have much milk.

original: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su dbyar zla ba 'bring po nya ba'i tshe glog dang / de bzhin du rlung 'byung bar gyur cing sprin sgra byung bar yang gyur pa de'i tshe ni chu'i char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ba dang / bde ba dang / nad med pa dang /
analyzed: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su dbyar zla ba 'bring po nya ba'i tshe glog dang / de bzhin du rlung 'byung bar gyur cing sprin sgra byung bar yang gyur pa de'i tshe ni chu'i char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ba dang / bde ba dang / nad med pa dang /
translated: When lightning and wind occur in the northeast during the full moon of the middle summer month and clouds make a sound, at that time a great rain of water will fall, happiness, health,

original: lo legs pa dang / lo tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye dgu rnams nad med cing phan tshun byams pas rnam par 'brel ba can du 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba dang / de bzhin du yams kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: lo legs pa dang / lo tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye dgu rnams nad med cing phan tshun byams pas rnam par 'brel ba can du 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba dang / de bzhin du yams kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: There will be good harvests, abundant crops, and the people will be free from disease and will be mutually affectionate and connected. The king will be victorious, and likewise all epidemics will be completely pacified.

original: sa las skye ba thams cad kyi me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa las skye ba thams cad kyi me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All the flowers, fruits, and so forth that grow from the earth will appear.

original: dbyar ka 'brug gi sgra drag tu yang 'byung na sgra brnyan gyis nyams pa'i sgra gnam lta bu dang bcas pa grag pa der ni lus can rnams la shin tu dman par 'gyur par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dbyar ka 'brug gi sgra drag tu yang 'byung na sgra brnyan gyis nyams pa'i sgra gnam lta bu dang bcas pa grag pa der ni lus can rnams la shin tu dman par 'gyur par bstan pa'o //
translated: If in the summer the sound of thunder roars strongly, it is said that it will be a sound like the sky with the sound of a musical instrument. There it is taught that for embodied beings it will be very low.
