translated: When the lightning is red and the edges are blue in the sky, a little rain will fall from the fire direction.

original: gang gi tshe nub phyogs kyi char sprin gyi dbus 'ja' snum pa nor bu beed'urya'i 'od lta bu byung bar gyur cing glog 'gyur pa'i yal ga dang / rang gi phyogs nas rlung gis bskyod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe ni zhig bdun bdun du char ba 'bab par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nub phyogs kyi char sprin gyi dbus 'ja' snum pa nor bu beed'urya'i 'od lta bu byung bar gyur cing glog 'gyur pa'i yal ga dang / rang gi phyogs nas rlung gis bskyod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe ni zhig bdun bdun du char ba 'bab par rig par bya'o //
translated: When in the west, in the middle of the rain clouds, a rainbow appears with the luster of a vaiḍūrya gem, and lightning flashes with branches and is stirred by the wind from its own direction, then it should be known that rain will fall for seven times seven days.

original: gang gi tshe shar ram byang nas kha ba 'bab cing rlung 'byung la phyogs dud ka dang / sngo bsangs su byed pa de'i tshe ni chu cher 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe shar ram byang nas kha ba 'bab cing rlung 'byung la phyogs dud ka dang / sngo bsangs su byed pa de'i tshe ni chu cher 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: When snow falls from the east or north and the wind blows, and the directions become smoky and dark blue, then there will be a great flood.

original: gang gi tshe nyi ma shar ba'am /
analyzed: gang gi tshe nyi ma shar ba'am /
translated: When the sun rises

original: dus tshigs kyi chags pa 'byung bar char pa'i thigs pa 'bab pa de'i tshe ni nges par char mo che 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus tshigs kyi chags pa 'byung bar char pa'i thigs pa 'bab pa de'i tshe ni nges par char mo che 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the rain falls in the form of a continuous stream, then it will certainly rain heavily.

original: gal te yang nyi ma shar ba'i tshe sbal pas skad ran cing snyan pa 'byung ba de'i tshe char mo che 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te yang nyi ma shar ba'i tshe sbal pas skad ran cing snyan pa 'byung ba de'i tshe char mo che 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: If, when the sun rises, the frog makes a sound that is appropriate and pleasant, then it will rain heavily.

original: mi gzhan zhig lag na gdugs thogs nas char ba'i mtshan ma dris sam khyim 'gengs bzhin du dris na de'i tshe rtag tu char pa 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi gzhan zhig lag na gdugs thogs nas char ba'i mtshan ma dris sam khyim 'gengs bzhin du dris na de'i tshe rtag tu char pa 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: If another person, holding an umbrella, asks about the sign of rain or asks while filling a house, then it will always rain.

original: gos gsher bas kyang dris na char ba'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: gos gsher bas kyang dris na char ba'i rgyu yin te /
translated: Even if asked by a wet-clothed person, it is the cause of rain.

original: de la mod kho nar char du 'bab par 'gyur ba the tshom med do //
analyzed: de la mod kho nar char du 'bab par 'gyur ba the tshom med do //
translated: There is no doubt that it will rain immediately.

original: chu'i phyogs su 'dug nas dris kyang rung ste /
analyzed: chu'i phyogs su 'dug nas dris kyang rung ste /
translated: It is also suitable to ask while sitting in the direction of water.

original: char pa 'bab par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: char pa 'bab par blta bar bya'o //
translated: One should look for rain.

original: byi la dang / sre mong dang / sprul rnams dang / gang yang gzhan dag tu gan du gnas pa dag gal te drod mi mthun par rgyug par byed na mod la char 'bab par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: byi la dang / sre mong dang / sprul rnams dang / gang yang gzhan dag tu gan du gnas pa dag gal te drod mi mthun par rgyug par byed na mod la char 'bab par ston pa yin no //
translated: monkeys, snakes, and other animals that live in holes, if they run about in a disorderly fashion, it is a sign that rain will fall immediately.

original: byis pa 'jim pas byug pa dang / mgo me tog phreng ba dkris pa gang na 'dug pa dar ni /
analyzed: byis pa 'jim pas byug pa dang / mgo me tog phreng ba dkris pa gang na 'dug pa dar ni /
translated: If children smeared with mud or with their heads wrapped in garlands of flowers are seen,

original: 'phral du char pa mngon par 'bab par byed do //
analyzed: 'phral du char pa mngon par 'bab par byed do //
translated: it is a sign that rain will fall immediately.

original: lus rdul gyis byugs pa'i byis pa dag rdul gyis rtse bar byed pa dang / yur ba 'gengs par byed na phral du char pa 'bab pa'i rgyu yin te /🔽char pa @31a * //
analyzed: lus rdul gyis byugs pa'i byis pa dag rdul gyis rtse bar byed pa dang / yur ba 'gengs par byed na phral du char pa 'bab pa'i rgyu yin te / char pa @31a * //
translated: If children smeared with dust play in the dust and fill up the irrigation ditches, it is a sign that rain will fall immediately.

original: 'bab pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa rnams kyis de ni 'phral du char pa 'bab par bshad pa yin no //🔽gang gi tshe sprin kyang med /
analyzed: 'bab pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa rnams kyis de ni 'phral du char pa 'bab par bshad pa yin no // gang gi tshe sprin kyang med /
translated: The wise who are skilled in the characteristics of rain declare that this is a sign of immediate rain.

original: kha ba yang med par rlung shin tu bsil ba dag 'byung zhing /
analyzed: kha ba yang med par rlung shin tu bsil ba dag 'byung zhing /
translated: When there are no clouds and no snow, but very cold winds blow,

original: lus can grang bar byed pa ni der 'phral du nges par char pa 'bab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: lus can grang bar byed pa ni der 'phral du nges par char pa 'bab par byed pa'o //
translated: The birds that make the bodies of living beings cold are the ones that immediately cause rain to fall there.

original: chu nas skyes pa'i bya shing gi yal ga la zhon pa dag nyi mas 'dab ma skems par byed pa ni shin tu char pa 'bab par yang ston pa yin no //🔽gang gi tshe shing la gnas pa'i bya 'dab ma skems par byed pa de ni char pa 'bab par byed pa'i rgyu yin par bstan bcos mkhas pa rnams kyis bstan bcos las brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: chu nas skyes pa'i bya shing gi yal ga la zhon pa dag nyi mas 'dab ma skems par byed pa ni shin tu char pa 'bab par yang ston pa yin no // gang gi tshe shing la gnas pa'i bya 'dab ma skems par byed pa de ni char pa 'bab par byed pa'i rgyu yin par bstan bcos mkhas pa rnams kyis bstan bcos las brjod pa yin no //
translated: The birds that are born in the water and sit on the branches of trees, whose wings are dried by the sun, are the ones that announce the rain that will fall.🔽When the birds that live in the trees dry their wings, the wise ones who know the causes of rain declare that this is a sign of rain.

original: grong gi byi'u khrus byed cing 'dab ma sbrug par byed pa gang yin pa de ni char pa 'bab pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa rnams kyis char pa'i rgyu yin par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: grong gi byi'u khrus byed cing 'dab ma sbrug par byed pa gang yin pa de ni char pa 'bab pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa rnams kyis char pa'i rgyu yin par brjod pa yin no //
translated: The birds that live in the village, who bathe and shake their wings, are the ones who announce the rain that will fall.

original: char ltas kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o /
analyzed: char ltas kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o /
translated: The ninth chapter on the signs of rain is completed.

original: // / dus tshigs kyi 'od chags pa'i ltas la bram ze rig pa can gyis dus tshigs kyi 'od chags pa bsgrims te brtags nas dus bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: // / dus tshigs kyi 'od chags pa'i ltas la bram ze rig pa can gyis dus tshigs kyi 'od chags pa bsgrims te brtags nas dus bstan par bya ste /
translated: The brahmin who is skilled in the signs of the seasons should carefully examine the radiance of the seasons and predict the season.

original: gang gi tshe nang nub tu dus tshigs mdog snum zhing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe nang nub tu dus tshigs mdog snum zhing /
translated: When the radiance of the seasons is seen to be like the color of the inside of a lotus flower,

original: ldong ros lta bu'i 'od dam pa bla'i 'od lta bur mthong na zhag gsum gyi bar du char pa 'bab par ltas shes pa dag gis brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: ldong ros lta bu'i 'od dam pa bla'i 'od lta bur mthong na zhag gsum gyi bar du char pa 'bab par ltas shes pa dag gis brjod pa yin no //
translated: or like the radiance of vermilion, or like the light of the moon, the seers say that rain will fall for three days.

original: dus tshigs kyi kha dog dung dang / gur gum dang / ba lang gi gcin lta bu'i 'od 'byung ba de dag ni 'phral du char ba 'bab pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: dus tshigs kyi kha dog dung dang / gur gum dang / ba lang gi gcin lta bu'i 'od 'byung ba de dag ni 'phral du char ba 'bab pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The radiance that arises like the color of the seasons, conch, saffron, or cow's urine is the cause of rain falling immediately.

original: dbyar ka dus tshigs gnyis kar yang kha dog snum pa dang / gur gum lta bu dang / gnag pa dang / rang bzhin gyis mtshal gyi 'od lta bu 'byung ba dang / kha dog khrag gi rgyun dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang / de bzhin du rgya skyegs kyi khu ba lta bu dang /
analyzed: dbyar ka dus tshigs gnyis kar yang kha dog snum pa dang / gur gum lta bu dang / gnag pa dang / rang bzhin gyis mtshal gyi 'od lta bu 'byung ba dang / kha dog khrag gi rgyun dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang / de bzhin du rgya skyegs kyi khu ba lta bu dang /
translated: And likewise, with light like the flow of blood, and likewise like lac juice,

original: de bzhin du zangs ltar dmar ba dag gis ni dus tshigs 'jigs par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du zangs ltar dmar ba dag gis ni dus tshigs 'jigs par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: and like copper, they make the seasons fearful.

original: dus tshigs kha dog rtsub pa dag tu dmag dang mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / khrag gi chag chag btab pa'i sa rnams 'byung ba ni shin tu 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus tshigs kha dog rtsub pa dag tu dmag dang mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / khrag gi chag chag btab pa'i sa rnams 'byung ba ni shin tu 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the seasons with rough colors, there will be war, weapons, and the ground sprinkled with blood, which is very fearful.

original: dus tshigs kyi chags pa shin tu dmar ba ni nyin gsum du char pa 'bab par bstan to //
analyzed: dus tshigs kyi chags pa shin tu dmar ba ni nyin gsum du char pa 'bab par bstan to //
translated: In the seasons with very red formations, it is taught that rain will fall for three days.

original: yang na mtshon gyis 'debs pa mtshon gyis 'tsho ba'i skye bo zad par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na mtshon gyis 'debs pa mtshon gyis 'tsho ba'i skye bo zad par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Or, those who live by weapons will be destroyed by weapons.

original: gang du dus tshigs gnyi gar phyogs su rdo yi char ba 'bab pa der ni mkhris pa'i nad la sogs pas lus can 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du dus tshigs gnyi gar phyogs su rdo yi char ba 'bab pa der ni mkhris pa'i nad la sogs pas lus can 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Where the stone rains fall in both seasons, beings die there from bile diseases and so on.

original: @31b gal te dus tshigs kyi chags pa yang dang yang du byis pa dag dmag 'gyed pa na rnam par skrag par 'gyur zhing rab tu rgyug par byed pa der ni yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @31b gal te dus tshigs kyi chags pa yang dang yang du byis pa dag dmag 'gyed pa na rnam par skrag par 'gyur zhing rab tu rgyug par byed pa der ni yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the arrangement of the seasons is disturbed, and the childish fight there, terrified, running about, the country will be destroyed.

original: dus tshigs kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i nyi zla gnyis dang lhan cig tu 'byung zhing /
analyzed: dus tshigs kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i nyi zla gnyis dang lhan cig tu 'byung zhing /
translated: The sun and moon, which have the nature of the seasons, arise together.

original: kha dog gi 'od dmar ba dang / rtsub pa ma yin pa ni lo legs pa dang bde ba'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: kha dog gi 'od dmar ba dang / rtsub pa ma yin pa ni lo legs pa dang bde ba'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The red light and the roughness are the cause of good harvests and happiness.

original: dus tshigs gnyi gar 'od shin tu gang cing mun pa dang 'dra bas gang na de'i dmag dpon rnams 'khrug pa dang / gsod par yang bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: dus tshigs gnyi gar 'od shin tu gang cing mun pa dang 'dra bas gang na de'i dmag dpon rnams 'khrug pa dang / gsod par yang bstan par bya'o //
translated: In both seasons, the light is very strong, and it is as if it were dark. Where the generals fight and kill there, it should be explained.

original: gang du dus tshigs kyi rang bzhin grang ba dang / dro ba dang / 'jam pa dang / rtsub pa rnams phyin ci log tu gyur pa der ni nad dang / 'chi ba dang / rgyal po la 'jigs pa 'byung ba'am /
analyzed: gang du dus tshigs kyi rang bzhin grang ba dang / dro ba dang / 'jam pa dang / rtsub pa rnams phyin ci log tu gyur pa der ni nad dang / 'chi ba dang / rgyal po la 'jigs pa 'byung ba'am /
translated: Where the nature of the seasons is reversed, cold, hot, soft, and rough, there will be disease, death, and fear of the king.

original: yang na nges par bdag po 'chi bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na nges par bdag po 'chi bar bstan pa yin no //
translated: Or it is taught that the lord himself will die.

original: de'i nye 'khor du chom rkun dang / sbrul dang / srin po rnams kyi dbang du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i nye 'khor du chom rkun dang / sbrul dang / srin po rnams kyi dbang du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: In its vicinity, there will be the power of thieves, snakes, and rākṣasas.

original: dus tshigs kyi 'od chags pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o /
analyzed: dus tshigs kyi 'od chags pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o /
translated: This is the tenth chapter on the omens of the seasons.

original: // / dri za'i grong khyer gyi ltas la /
analyzed: // / dri za'i grong khyer gyi ltas la /
translated: In the omens of the gandharva city,

analyzed: gal te shar phyogs su dri za'i grong khyer byung bar gyur na nub phyogs na 'dug pa'i rgyal po la mchog tu 'jigs pa 'byung bar bstan pa yin no //

translated: When the gandharva city appears in the north, at that time, fear will arise for the kings who live in the south.

original: gang gi tshe lho phyogs su dri za'i grong khyer snang bar gyur na de'i tshe ni byang phyogs na gnas pa rnams la 'jigs pa 'byung bar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe lho phyogs su dri za'i grong khyer snang bar gyur na de'i tshe ni byang phyogs na gnas pa rnams la 'jigs pa 'byung bar brjod pa yin no //
translated: When the gandharva city appears in the south, at that time, it should be said that fear will arise for those who live in the north.

analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer chags pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o /

analyzed: mi mthun pa'i don brjod pa der ni rgyal po 'chi bar rjod par byed do //
translated: then this is said to be an omen of the king’s death.

original: lha rten dang gzugs 'gyur ba'i ltas kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: lha rten dang gzugs 'gyur ba'i ltas kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: Signs of the king, the minister, and the brahmin setting out on a journey, and of the rise of the people

original: / lam du 'jug pa'i ltas la gang gi tshe rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dag lam du 'jug cing 'phags pa na gnam grum pa dang bcas pa'i skar mda' 'byung ba dang ser pa 'bab pa ni de dag mi mthun par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: / lam du 'jug pa'i ltas la gang gi tshe rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dag lam du 'jug cing 'phags pa na gnam grum pa dang bcas pa'i skar mda' 'byung ba dang ser pa 'bab pa ni de dag mi mthun par brjod pa yin te /
translated: When the king, the minister, and the brahmin set out on a journey and ascend, if a meteor falls with thunder and lightning, and if it rains sand, this is said to be inauspicious for them.

original: de dag dgos pa yang dag par mi 'grub pa tsam zad kyi lus 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag dgos pa yang dag par mi 'grub pa tsam zad kyi lus 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Not only will their purpose not be accomplished, but their bodies will be in danger.

original: gang gi dus su nyi ma 'char ba'i chos phyogs gang dag tu 'gro ba na bya rog dang / ngang pa dang / bya ka randa ba dang / krung krung dag snang ba der ni dge bar blta'o //
analyzed: gang gi dus su nyi ma 'char ba'i chos phyogs gang dag tu 'gro ba na bya rog dang / ngang pa dang / bya ka randa ba dang / krung krung dag snang ba der ni dge bar blta'o //
translated: When the sun rises, if crows, geese, karandavas, and cranes are seen in the directions where they are going, that is auspicious.

original: sprin dang / 'ja' dang / de bzhin du glog 'gyu ba dang / chu sbyin par byed pa'i 'brug mi gsal ba 'byin pa dag ni 'jigs pa bden par rig par byed pa yin no ;
analyzed: sprin dang / 'ja' dang / de bzhin du glog 'gyu ba dang / chu sbyin par byed pa'i 'brug mi gsal ba 'byin pa dag ni 'jigs pa bden par rig par byed pa yin no ;
translated: If there are clouds, rainbows, lightning, and indistinct thunder that gives water, one should know that the danger is true.

original: / lam bu 'jug pa'i ltas kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o //
analyzed: / lam bu 'jug pa'i ltas kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o //
translated: CHAPTER 13: THE SIGNS OF THE PATH

original: gang du ltas sna tshogs bstan pa de dag gi 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshad bstan pa gza' skar dag la mig dmar gyi ltas 'byung ba ni zhag bdun nas 'bras bu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang du ltas sna tshogs bstan pa de dag gi 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshad bstan pa gza' skar dag la mig dmar gyi ltas 'byung ba ni zhag bdun nas 'bras bu 'byung ngo //
translated: The results of the various signs taught there will occur at the following times. When the signs of Mars occur in the planets and stars, the results will occur within seven days.

original: de bzhin du gza' lag ni zhag bcu tshun chad kyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin du gza' lag ni zhag bcu tshun chad kyis so //
translated: Similarly, the results of the signs of Jupiter will occur within ten days.

original: phur @32b bu ni lo gcig gis rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phur @32b bu ni lo gcig gis rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The results of the signs of Saturn will ripen within one year.

original: pa bsangs ni zla ba drug tshun chad kyis smin par 'gyur bar bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: pa bsangs ni zla ba drug tshun chad kyis smin par 'gyur bar bstan par bya'o //
translated: The results of the signs of Venus should be taught to ripen within six months.

original: gnam grum pa dang / sa gyo ba ni zla ba brgyad du brjod do //
analyzed: gnam grum pa dang / sa gyo ba ni zla ba brgyad du brjod do //
translated: Earthquakes and tremors are said to occur every eight months.

original: grong khyer dang / mchod rten dang / shing dang 'brel pa ni zla ba gcig nas smin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grong khyer dang / mchod rten dang / shing dang 'brel pa ni zla ba gcig nas smin par 'gyur ro //
translated: When [the signs] are related to cities, stupas, or trees, the results will ripen within one month.

original: rdo gseg ma'i char pa 'bab pa dang / de bzhin du sprin sgra 'byung ba dang / gza'u rnams 'khyams pa ni zhag gsum tshun chad kyis smin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo gseg ma'i char pa 'bab pa dang / de bzhin du sprin sgra 'byung ba dang / gza'u rnams 'khyams pa ni zhag gsum tshun chad kyis smin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The falling of a rain of stones and pebbles, the sound of thunder, and the wandering of meteors are all to be understood as having their results within three days.

original: nyi zla'i yang 'phral du 'bras bur 'gyur bar bstan par bya'o //🔽'ja' zug pa ni zla ba bcu gnyis su brtag go //
analyzed: nyi zla'i yang 'phral du 'bras bur 'gyur bar bstan par bya'o // 'ja' zug pa ni zla ba bcu gnyis su brtag go //
translated: The results of the sun and moon are to be understood as occurring immediately.🔽A rainbow is to be understood as having its result within twelve months.

original: ser ba 'bab ba las ni zla ba phyed dang gnyis kyis 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ser ba 'bab ba las ni zla ba phyed dang gnyis kyis 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
translated: A hailstorm is to be understood as having its result within a month and a half.

original: me med par me 'bar ba lta bur snang ba ni 'bras bu 'phral du 'byung bar mkhas pa dag gis bshad do //
analyzed: me med par me 'bar ba lta bur snang ba ni 'bras bu 'phral du 'byung bar mkhas pa dag gis bshad do //
translated: The appearance of fire without smoke is to be understood as having its result immediately, according to the wise.

original: de bzhin du 'byig 'gyur ba dang / mngal dag phyin ci log pa dang / dus ma yin par lo tog 'bras bu chags pa thams cad kyi yang zla ba drug par brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'byig 'gyur ba dang / mngal dag phyin ci log pa dang / dus ma yin par lo tog 'bras bu chags pa thams cad kyi yang zla ba drug par brjod do //
translated: Similarly, the reversal of the seasons, the reversal of the womb, and the reversal of the ripening of crops are all to be understood as having their results within six months.

original: sprin med pa'i sgra dag zer ba ni zla ba gcig gis so //
analyzed: sprin med pa'i sgra dag zer ba ni zla ba gcig gis so //
translated: The sound of a cloudless sky is to be understood as having its result within one month.

original: 'ja'i ltas lta bu ni zhag gsum tshun chad kyis 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'ja'i ltas lta bu ni zhag gsum tshun chad kyis 'byung ngo //
translated: A sign like a rainbow is to be understood as having its result within three days.

original: stag dang / byi la dang / wa dang / sre mo dang / bya rnams dang / bar snang las sgra byung ba rnams kyis ni 'bras bu 'phral du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: stag dang / byi la dang / wa dang / sre mo dang / bya rnams dang / bar snang las sgra byung ba rnams kyis ni 'bras bu 'phral du 'byung ngo //
translated: Tigers, cats, foxes, mongooses, birds, and sounds from the sky indicate immediate results.

original: yang bya dang / grog spur dang / phye ma leb rnams kyis ni zhag bcu tshun cad kyis so //
analyzed: yang bya dang / grog spur dang / phye ma leb rnams kyis ni zhag bcu tshun cad kyis so //
translated: Birds, ants, and butterflies indicate results within ten days.

original: yang byi ba dang / sbrul dang / de bzhin du sbrang bu mang po'i ltas bstan pa las ni zla ba gcig tu shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yang byi ba dang / sbrul dang / de bzhin du sbrang bu mang po'i ltas bstan pa las ni zla ba gcig tu shes par bya'o //
translated: Rats, snakes, and swarms of insects indicate results within one month.

original: ri dags kyi rigs rnams dang / bya dag gi skad byung ba ni zla ba gsum gyis 'bras bu 'byin to //🔽dus tshigs kyi mtshan @33a * //
analyzed: ri dags kyi rigs rnams dang / bya dag gi skad byung ba ni zla ba gsum gyis 'bras bu 'byin to // dus tshigs kyi mtshan @33a * //
translated: The sounds of various animals and birds indicate results within three months.

original: ma rnams ni zhag bdun tshun chad kyis so //
analyzed: ma rnams ni zhag bdun tshun chad kyis so //
translated: The signs of the seasons indicate results within seven days.

original: dri za'i grong khyer chags pa ni zla ba gsum gyis 'bras bu 'byung bar bshad do //
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer chags pa ni zla ba gsum gyis 'bras bu 'byung bar bshad do //
translated: The appearance of a gandharva city indicates results within three months.

original: ltas sna tshogs bstan pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: ltas sna tshogs bstan pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
translated: This concludes the fourteenth chapter, on the results of various omens, from The Quintessence Tantra, the Secret Oral Tradition of the Eight Branches.

original: // / gnod pa'i ltas ngan rnams kyi rgyu bstan pa dang ; de dag gi ngo lon gyi cho ga bstan pa /
analyzed: // / gnod pa'i ltas ngan rnams kyi rgyu bstan pa dang ; de dag gi ngo lon gyi cho ga bstan pa /
translated: The explanation of the causes of harmful bad omens, and the explanation of the ritual for averting them.

original: yong gi srid pa ma yin pa phyin ci log tu snang ba gang yin pa de dag ni phal cher mi dga' ba'i 'bras bu'i dbus su 'byin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yong gi srid pa ma yin pa phyin ci log tu snang ba gang yin pa de dag ni phal cher mi dga' ba'i 'bras bu'i dbus su 'byin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Those that are not real existences, but appear erroneously, should be known as mostly arising in the middle of unpleasant results.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de dag gi rgyu ni 'di ltar nyes par spyod pa mang po la sogs shing bsags pa las byung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dag gi rgyu ni 'di ltar nyes par spyod pa mang po la sogs shing bsags pa las byung ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because their cause is the accumulation of much bad conduct and so forth.

original: de dag yang kha cig las ngan pa'i dbang gis yul log par snang bar grub pa yang yod /
analyzed: de dag yang kha cig las ngan pa'i dbang gis yul log par snang bar grub pa yang yod /
translated: Some are established as appearing in wrong places due to the power of bad karma.

original: kha cig mi ma yin pa dag gis sbran pa'i phyir ched du bstan pa dag yod pas na gang dag mi ston pa ltar snang ba de dag kyang 'dir thub pa lha'i mig can de dag gis bstan pa bzhin nges pa can du gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: kha cig mi ma yin pa dag gis sbran pa'i phyir ched du bstan pa dag yod pas na gang dag mi ston pa ltar snang ba de dag kyang 'dir thub pa lha'i mig can de dag gis bstan pa bzhin nges pa can du gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Some are taught by non-humans in order to frighten them. Therefore, even those that appear to be not taught should be ascertained here according to the teachings of those sages with the divine eye.

original: gang dag kha cig tu dngos po mi srid pa lta bu zhig tu brgya la snang na /
analyzed: gang dag kha cig tu dngos po mi srid pa lta bu zhig tu brgya la snang na /
translated: If something appears to be impossible,

original: der yon tan zhig na dge zhing bzang ba dang / phyin ci log cig na'ang mi dge ba'i don du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: der yon tan zhig na dge zhing bzang ba dang / phyin ci log cig na'ang mi dge ba'i don du rig par bya'o //
translated: it should be understood as virtuous and good if it is a quality, and as non-virtuous if it is an error.

original: de ltar mi dge bar gyur ba'i mtshan ma de dag ni gnyen po so sor brten pa dag gis zlog par 'gyur srid de /
analyzed: de ltar mi dge bar gyur ba'i mtshan ma de dag ni gnyen po so sor brten pa dag gis zlog par 'gyur srid de /
translated: In this way, those signs that have become non-virtuous can be averted by relying on their individual antidotes.

original: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: bsod nams la rab tu gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / rnam par dag pa la rten bdag dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas brjod la brtson par bya ba dang / ser sna bcom pa dang / lha dang bram ze dag la mchod pa dang /
analyzed: bsod nams la rab tu gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / rnam par dag pa la rten bdag dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas brjod la brtson par bya ba dang / ser sna bcom pa dang / lha dang bram ze dag la mchod pa dang /
translated: Those who possess a mind that abides in merit, those who rely on purity, those who strive in fire offerings and mantra recitation, those who conquer stinginess, and those who make offerings to gods and Brahmins.

original: zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya ba dang / bsam pa dri ma med pas nor rab tu sbyin pa dag gi mtshan ma ngan ba dag gis mi tshugs shing rnam par 'jig par byed do //
analyzed: zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya ba dang / bsam pa dri ma med pas nor rab tu sbyin pa dag gi mtshan ma ngan ba dag gis mi tshugs shing rnam par 'jig par byed do //
translated: The rites of pacifying and enriching, the rites of recitation and homa, and the pure intention to give away one’s wealth will not be overcome by inauspicious signs, and will destroy them.

original: gal te gnyen po byed pa'i stobs dag gis kun du zlog par gyur na yang rgyal po 'chi ba las rab tu bcad de tshe nur /
analyzed: gal te gnyen po byed pa'i stobs dag gis kun du zlog par gyur na yang rgyal po 'chi ba las rab tu bcad de tshe nur /
translated: Even if one is able to ward off [inauspicious signs] through the power of antidotes, the king’s life will be cut short.

original: grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor de dag rgyug cing rnam par 'jig pa yang yun ring du gnas pa tsam du 'gyur bar bstan to //
analyzed: grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor de dag rgyug cing rnam par 'jig pa yang yun ring du gnas pa tsam du 'gyur bar bstan to //
translated: The running and destruction of those towns, cities, and countries will be taught to last only a short while.

original: thub pa'i tshogs mchog gar ga la /
analyzed: thub pa'i tshogs mchog gar ga la /
translated: Where is the supreme assembly of sages?

original: bha ra dhva dza goo ta mas //
analyzed: bha ra dhva dza goo ta mas //
translated: By Bharadvāja Gautama,🔽The signs of the gods, space, the sky,

original: lha yul bar snang sa bla dang // gza' skar srog chags rnams kyi ltas //
analyzed: lha yul bar snang sa bla dang // gza' skar srog chags rnams kyi ltas //
translated: The planets, stars, and living beings,🔽For the king, the human king,

original: sa bdag mi yi rgyal po dang // grong dang yul 'khor gnas pa la //
analyzed: sa bdag mi yi rgyal po dang // grong dang yul 'khor gnas pa la //
translated: And for the towns, countries, and abodes,

original: gnod par gyur pa'i ltas @33b 'byung la //
analyzed: gnod par gyur pa'i ltas @33b 'byung la //
translated: The signs of harm arise.

original: cho ga gang dang gang dag gis //
analyzed: cho ga gang dang gang dag gis //
translated: Whatever the ritual,

original: zhu bar 'gyur ba zhus pa las //🔽thub pa gar gas lung bstan pa //
analyzed: zhu bar 'gyur ba zhus pa las // thub pa gar gas lung bstan pa //
translated: it is requested that it be performed.

original: phan par 'gyur ba'i cho ga gang //
analyzed: phan par 'gyur ba'i cho ga gang //
translated: Whatever the ritual that will be beneficial🔽for the Sage to prophesy,

original: goo ta mas nyan par gyis //
analyzed: goo ta mas nyan par gyis //
translated: Gautama, listen!

original: dang por sbyin pa gtang bya ste //
analyzed: dang por sbyin pa gtang bya ste //
translated: First, one should practice generosity,

original: lha dang bram ze mngon mchod na //
analyzed: lha dang bram ze mngon mchod na //
translated: making offerings to gods and brahmins.

original: sbyin sreg bzlas brjod mchod sbyin gyis //
analyzed: sbyin sreg bzlas brjod mchod sbyin gyis //
translated: Through burnt offerings, mantra recitation, and worship,

original: gtong ba'i ngo lon bya bar bstan //
analyzed: gtong ba'i ngo lon bya bar bstan //
translated: it is taught that one should repay the gift.

original: de la thog mar ba lang dang // dbyig dang gos la sogs pa dag / bram ze rnams la sbyin byin nas //
analyzed: de la thog mar ba lang dang // dbyig dang gos la sogs pa dag / bram ze rnams la sbyin byin nas //
translated: First, having given cows, gold, clothes, and so forth to the brahmins,🔽individually in their homes,

original: so sor khyim du rgyal po la //🔽gtso bo dag la ci rigs par //
analyzed: so sor khyim du rgyal po la // gtso bo dag la ci rigs par //
translated: the king

original: dbang sgyur ba ni legs par bya //🔽mdun na 'don zhing mnyam gzhag pa //
analyzed: dbang sgyur ba ni legs par bya // mdun na 'don zhing mnyam gzhag pa //
translated: should properly exercise control over the chieftains.

original: zhag bdun smyung ba byas gyur pas //
analyzed: zhag bdun smyung ba byas gyur pas //
translated: The royal priest, having fasted for seven days,

original: lha la gtor ma rab phul te //
analyzed: lha la gtor ma rab phul te //
translated: should make a great offering to the gods.

original: au dum b'a ra'i yam shing sreg / shing mar btags pa brgya rtsa brgyad nang par ldang zhing sngags rig pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: au dum b'a ra'i yam shing sreg / shing mar btags pa brgya rtsa brgyad nang par ldang zhing sngags rig pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: One should offer one hundred and eight oblations of udumbara sticks smeared with ghee at dawn, reciting the vidyā.

original: yang na bram ze gtsang ma zas su mar za zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba spangs te /
analyzed: yang na bram ze gtsang ma zas su mar za zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba spangs te /
translated: Or else, a pure brahmin who subsists on ghee and avoids food and drink,

analyzed: zhag gsum smyung ba byas pa'i sngags mkhan gyis rig sngags tra ta ram zhes bya ba 'dis aa pa marga'i yam shing bsreg shing mar la btags pa brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o // yang rgyal po'i pho brang ngam /
translated: a mantra practitioner who has fasted for three days, should offer one hundred and eight oblations of sticks of the apāmārga plant smeared with ghee, reciting the vidyā called Traṭarā.🔽Or else, for the sake of a king's palace,

analyzed: grong khyer ram /
translated: a city,

analyzed: yul gyi phyir rgyal po'i mdun na 'don gyi lha la zhag bdun du gtor ma phul la / mar bre do'am /
translated: or a country, one should offer a bali to the king's chief deity for seven days,🔽and offer one hundred and eight oblations of ghee or

analyzed: yang na bre gad mar la btags pa'i nas bre'u chung gnyis kho nas sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: two small measures of barley smeared with ghee.🔽Having completed the rite of oblation in this way, one should feed one hundred

original: de ltar sbyin sreg gi cho ga zin nas bram ze rnams brgya'am /
analyzed: de ltar sbyin sreg gi cho ga zin nas bram ze rnams brgya'am /
translated: brahmins,

analyzed: de las lhag pa dag la 'o thug blud pa'am /
translated: For the rest, they should be given milk to drink.

original: yang na zhag bdun du chos ston bya'o //

translated: if in the west, it will harm the people;🔽if in the north, it will harm the people;🔽if in the south, it will harm the king.🔽If it appears in the east in the morning, it will harm the king;🔽if in the west in the morning, it will harm the people;

original: nub mo'am / de'i tshe mtshams su skar mda' rtsub mo yon po snang na rab tu bsngags pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nub mo'am / de'i tshe mtshams su skar mda' rtsub mo yon po snang na rab tu bsngags pa ma yin no //
translated: if in the north in the morning, it will harm the people;🔽if in the south in the morning, it will harm the king.🔽If it appears in the east in the evening, it will harm the people;🔽if in the west in the evening, it will harm the king;🔽if in the north in the evening, it will harm the people;🔽if in the south in the evening, it will harm the king.

original: skar mda' gnam gyi dbus su song la sprin gyi chu 'thung ba ltar zhugs shing /
analyzed: skar mda' gnam gyi dbus su song la sprin gyi chu 'thung ba ltar zhugs shing /
translated: If a meteor appears in the middle of the sky, enters like drinking the water of clouds,

original: skar mda'i sgra med na /
analyzed: skar mda'i sgra med na /
translated: and has no sound,

original: skar mda'i dbus kyi mtshams yod par snang ba /
analyzed: skar mda'i dbus kyi mtshams yod par snang ba /
translated: if the middle of the meteor appears to have a boundary,

original: 'jam zhing drang la shin tu yangs shing dkar ba /
analyzed: 'jam zhing drang la shin tu yangs shing dkar ba /
translated: smooth, straight, very wide, and white,

original: logs g-yas g-yon du yang nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu ba snang na skar mnga' de dag ni dge ba ste /
analyzed: logs g-yas g-yon du yang nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu ba snang na skar mnga' de dag ni dge ba ste /
translated: and if it appears to move in the sky to the right and left, those meteors are virtuous,

original: 'bras bu dam pa rab tu sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: 'bras bu dam pa rab tu sbyin par byed do //
translated: granting the highest fruit.

original: skar mda' kha yod pa zhig snang na rgyal po la gnod pa dang / btsun mo la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skar mda' kha yod pa zhig snang na rgyal po la gnod pa dang / btsun mo la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If a meteor appears with a mouth, it will harm the king and harm the queen.

original: skar mda' rgyab kyis song la dud pas chog pa lta bu sgra can du byung na yul de'i 'khor ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skar mda' rgyab kyis song la dud pas chog pa lta bu sgra can du byung na yul de'i 'khor ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a meteor falls in the direction of the back, it is enough to make smoke. If it falls with a sound, the retinue of that country will be harmed.

original: srod la skar mda' byung ba ni bkra shis so //
analyzed: srod la skar mda' byung ba ni bkra shis so //
translated: If a meteor appears at dusk, it is auspicious.

original: skar mda' ri bong gi khrag ltar snang ba 'bar ba lhung na rgyal po dang dmag dpon la gnod do //
analyzed: skar mda' ri bong gi khrag ltar snang ba 'bar ba lhung na rgyal po dang dmag dpon la gnod do //
translated: If a meteor appears blazing like the blood of a rabbit and falls, it harms the king and the general.

original: skar mda' mtshan mo zla ba la phog gam nyin par nyi ma la phog na mi'i bdag po zla ba 'am skar mda' la mos par byed pa de 'chi'o //
analyzed: skar mda' mtshan mo zla ba la phog gam nyin par nyi ma la phog na mi'i bdag po zla ba 'am skar mda' la mos par byed pa de 'chi'o //
translated: If a meteor strikes the moon at night or the sun during the day, the lord of men who is devoted to the moon or the meteor will die.

original: skar mda' rab tu 'bar bas gza' 'am rgyu skar la mngon par phog na de la mos pa rnams la mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skar mda' rab tu 'bar bas gza' 'am rgyu skar la mngon par phog na de la mos pa rnams la mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a blazing meteor clearly strikes a planet or a constellation, it will be harmful to those who are devoted to it.

original: nye bar skar mda' me'i 'od lta bur lhung na yul 'khor gyi dbang po dang yul du bcas pa rnam par 'jig go //
analyzed: nye bar skar mda' me'i 'od lta bur lhung na yul 'khor gyi dbang po dang yul du bcas pa rnam par 'jig go //
translated: If a meteor falls like the light of fire nearby, the lord of the country and the country will be destroyed.

original: yul gyis gang du skar mda' sgra grags par lhung na yul der rgyal po dang / blun po dang / rkun bo'i drag shul snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul gyis gang du skar mda' sgra grags par lhung na yul der rgyal po dang / blun po dang / rkun bo'i drag shul snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Wherever the falling star is heard, in that country there will be the misfortune of kings, fools, and thieves.

original: skar mda'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o /
analyzed: skar mda'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o /
translated: This was the nineteenth chapter on the falling star.

original: // / nam mkha' las sgra byung ba'i ltas kyi mtshan ma bstan pa /
analyzed: // / nam mkha' las sgra byung ba'i ltas kyi mtshan ma bstan pa /
translated: Chapter Twenty: The Signs of the Appearance of Sounds in the Sky

original: rlung gnyis phan tshun nas phrad pa las gnam gru ma pa lta bu'i sgra byung ste /
analyzed: rlung gnyis phan tshun nas phrad pa las gnam gru ma pa lta bu'i sgra byung ste /
translated: The sound of the sky is the sound of the two winds meeting each other, like the sound of a flute.

original: de yang sa la babs pa dang / gyen du 'byung ba dang / thad du dang / rgyang ring po khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang sa la babs pa dang / gyen du 'byung ba dang / thad du dang / rgyang ring po khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, it should be understood as falling to the ground, rising up, being level, and being distant.

original: nyi ma rtse la sgra byung na rgyal rigs la gnod do //🔽snga @37a * //🔽dro sgra byung na dmangs rigs la gnod do //🔽nyi ma phyed pa'i tshe sgra byung na bram ze'i sde la gnod do //
analyzed: nyi ma rtse la sgra byung na rgyal rigs la gnod do // snga @37a * // dro sgra byung na dmangs rigs la gnod do // nyi ma phyed pa'i tshe sgra byung na bram ze'i sde la gnod do //
translated: If the sound occurs at sunrise, it harms the royal class.🔽If the sound occurs in the morning, it harms the śūdra class.🔽If the sound occurs at noon, it harms the brahmin class.

original: nyi ma nub pa'i tshe sgra byung na rje'u rigs kyi tshogs la gnod do //
analyzed: nyi ma nub pa'i tshe sgra byung na rje'u rigs kyi tshogs la gnod do //
translated: If the sound occurs at sunset, it harms the vaiśya class.

original: nyi ma nub ka'i dus su sgra byung na rigs ngan rnams la gnod do //
analyzed: nyi ma nub ka'i dus su sgra byung na rigs ngan rnams la gnod do //
translated: If the sound occurs at sunset, it is harmful to the low castes.

original: nam gyi bzhi thun gyi tho rangs sgra byung na lo thog la gnod do ;
analyzed: nam gyi bzhi thun gyi tho rangs sgra byung na lo thog la gnod do ;
translated: If the sound occurs at dawn, it is harmful to the crops.

original: / mtshan gyi gung la sgra byung na srin po mang po phung bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / mtshan gyi gung la sgra byung na srin po mang po phung bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the sound occurs at midnight, it will destroy many rākṣasas.

original: nam mkha' phan tshun na sgra byung na glang po che dang / rta ma rung bar byed do //
analyzed: nam mkha' phan tshun na sgra byung na glang po che dang / rta ma rung bar byed do //
translated: If the sound occurs in the sky, it will harm the elephants and horses.

original: nam langs nas sgra byung na 'gron po mang po la gnod do //
analyzed: nam langs nas sgra byung na 'gron po mang po la gnod do //
translated: If the sound occurs at dawn, it will harm many travelers.

original: sgra byung ba dal la thung na gnod pa chung dur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra byung ba dal la thung na gnod pa chung dur 'gyur ro //
translated: If the sound is slow and short, the harm will be small.

original: sgra ring du byung na 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: sgra ring du byung na 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
translated: If the sound is long, danger will arise.

original: dus gsum gang yang rung ba'i mtshams su sgra chen po byang phyogs su lhung na bram ze dam pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus gsum gang yang rung ba'i mtshams su sgra chen po byang phyogs su lhung na bram ze dam pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a loud sound occurs at any of the three junctures and falls to the north, a holy brahmin will die.

original: de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi tshogs gang gi nyi ma la sgra byung na de la brten pa'i bram ze gang yin pa la gnod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi tshogs gang gi nyi ma la sgra byung na de la brten pa'i bram ze gang yin pa la gnod do //
translated: Similarly, if the sound occurs on the day of any of the lunar mansions, it will harm the brahmins who are associated with it.

original: bden bral gyi phyogs nas sgra byung na drag shul gyi las byed pa la gnod do //
analyzed: bden bral gyi phyogs nas sgra byung na drag shul gyi las byed pa la gnod do //
translated: If the sound comes from the direction of the south, it is harmful for the performance of violent actions.🔽If the sound comes from the direction of the west, it is harmful for the performance of pacifying actions.🔽If the sound comes from the direction of the north, it is harmful for the performance of increasing actions.

original: rlung gi phyogs nas sgra byung na mtha' 'khob kyi lho bral la gnod do //
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs nas sgra byung na mtha' 'khob kyi lho bral la gnod do //
translated: If the sound comes from the direction of the wind, it is harmful for the performance of actions of separation from the borderlands.

original: me'i phyogs nas sgra byung na mes 'tsho ba la gnod do //
analyzed: me'i phyogs nas sgra byung na mes 'tsho ba la gnod do //
translated: If the sound comes from the direction of fire, it is harmful for the performance of actions of livelihood by fire.

original: phyogs ring du sgra 'byin pa der dpa' bo rnams dang / sbrul po che la gnod do //
analyzed: phyogs ring du sgra 'byin pa der dpa' bo rnams dang / sbrul po che la gnod do //
translated: If the sound comes from a distant direction, it is harmful for heroes and for great snakes.

original: sgra ltas kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o /
analyzed: sgra ltas kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o /
translated: This was the twentieth chapter on the omens of sound.

original: // / nyi ma dang zla ba 'khyims pa'i ltas kyi bye brag bstan pa /
analyzed: // / nyi ma dang zla ba 'khyims pa'i ltas kyi bye brag bstan pa /
translated: The chapter on the omens of the sun and moon being eclipsed.

original: nyi ma 'am /
analyzed: nyi ma 'am /
translated: If the light of the sun

original: zla ba'i 'od dang / rlung gcig tu 'dres pa las byung ba ni 'od 'khyims pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od dang / rlung gcig tu 'dres pa las byung ba ni 'od 'khyims pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: or the moon mixes with the wind, it is called an eclipse.

original: de la mar dang / til mar dang / chu dang / dngul dang / 'o ma dang / thi ba lta bu'i kha dog tu 'khyims na char ba 'bab po //
analyzed: de la mar dang / til mar dang / chu dang / dngul dang / 'o ma dang / thi ba lta bu'i kha dog tu 'khyims na char ba 'bab po //
translated: If it is eclipsed in the colors of butter, sesame oil, water, silver, milk, or a dove, there will be rain.

original: bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / shing rta lta bu'i 'od 'khyims pa las rab tu zhig ste /
analyzed: bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / shing rta lta bu'i 'od 'khyims pa las rab tu zhig ste /
translated: If the light is eclipsed like a donkey, camel, or chariot, it will be destroyed.

original: rnam par gyes shing kha dog ngan par snang na mi dge bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par gyes shing kha dog ngan par snang na mi dge bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it appears to be divided and of bad color, it is non-virtuous.

original: nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis ka'i nyin mtshan du 'od 'khyims par rtag tu 'gro na bcing ba dang / mtshon dang nad 'byung ngo //
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis ka'i nyin mtshan du 'od 'khyims par rtag tu 'gro na bcing ba dang / mtshon dang nad 'byung ngo //
translated: If both the sun and moon are always moving in a halo during the day and night, there will be bondage, weapons, and disease.

original: me 'bar bzhin du 'khyims na mchu mngon par skye'o //
analyzed: me 'bar bzhin du 'khyims na mchu mngon par skye'o //
translated: If it is moving like a blazing fire, the beak will appear.

original: 'ja' 'dra ba'i dbyibs su 'khyims na mtshon mang po 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'ja' 'dra ba'i dbyibs su 'khyims na mtshon mang po 'byung ngo //
translated: If it is moving in the shape of a rainbow, there will be many weapons.

original: rdul 'dra bar 'khyims na mu ge 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rdul 'dra bar 'khyims na mu ge 'byung ngo //
translated: If it is moving like dust, there will be famine.

original: sum rim du 'khyims na grong dang / rgyal po la mi dge'o //
analyzed: sum rim du 'khyims na grong dang / rgyal po la mi dge'o //
translated: If it is moving in three layers, there will be misfortune for the town and the king.

original: rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang / zho'i mdog 'dra bar 'khyims na 'thab mo dang g-yul 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang / zho'i mdog 'dra bar 'khyims na 'thab mo dang g-yul 'byung ngo //
translated: If it is moving like the color of lac or yogurt, there will be fighting and battles.

original: ser por 'khyims na yul 'khor gsum du 'jigs par ston /
analyzed: ser por 'khyims na yul 'khor gsum du 'jigs par ston /
translated: If it is moving yellow, it shows fear in the three provinces.

original: skya bo dang / ljang sngon du @37b 'khyims na sbrum ma 'chi'o //
analyzed: skya bo dang / ljang sngon du @37b 'khyims na sbrum ma 'chi'o //
translated: If it is moving gray or blue-green, the pregnant woman will die.

original: nor bu 'dra ba'i phyed dang sum cha'i dum bu gcig 'khyims na char pa 'phral du 'bab po //
analyzed: nor bu 'dra ba'i phyed dang sum cha'i dum bu gcig 'khyims na char pa 'phral du 'bab po //
translated: If it is half or three-quarters of a gem, the rain will fall immediately.

original: mtshan dus gsum du 'khyims na grong mi dang / rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan dus gsum du 'khyims na grong mi dang / rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is stuck for the three watches of the night, the people of the town and the king will die.

original: nyi ma gsum gyi bar du 'jam zhing snum par 'khyims na char ba 'bab po //
analyzed: nyi ma gsum gyi bar du 'jam zhing snum par 'khyims na char ba 'bab po //
translated: If it is stuck for three days, soft and oily, it will rain.

original: rtsub por 'khyims na char pa 'bab na zla ba gcig na 'jigs pa 'byung bar ston to //
analyzed: rtsub por 'khyims na char pa 'bab na zla ba gcig na 'jigs pa 'byung bar ston to //
translated: If it is stuck roughly, it will rain, and it shows that danger will come in a month.

original: skar ma dang gza'i thog tu 'khyims pas non na rang gi mthu las byung ba'i 'bras bur bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: skar ma dang gza'i thog tu 'khyims pas non na rang gi mthu las byung ba'i 'bras bur bstan par bya'o //
translated: If it is stuck in the path of the stars and planets, it should be shown to be the result of its own power.

original: nyi zla 'khyims pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig go /
analyzed: nyi zla 'khyims pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig go /
translated: This is the twenty-first chapter, on the sun and moon being stuck.

original: // /'ja' zug pa'i ltas kyi mtshan ma bstan pa /
analyzed: // /'ja' zug pa'i ltas kyi mtshan ma bstan pa /
translated: The chapter on the signs of a rainbow

original: rlung dang / sprin dang / nyi ma'i 'od las byung ba ni 'ja' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rlung dang / sprin dang / nyi ma'i 'od las byung ba ni 'ja' zhes bya'o //
translated: Wind, clouds, and the light of the sun are called a rainbow.

original: 'ja'i tshon sna tshogs su snang na char pa 'bab po //
analyzed: 'ja'i tshon sna tshogs su snang na char pa 'bab po //
translated: If the colors of the rainbow appear, it will rain.

original: chu'i nang du zug na char rab tu che'o //
analyzed: chu'i nang du zug na char rab tu che'o //
translated: If it is stuck in the water, there will be heavy rain.

original: tshon dkar po la sogs pa ni bram ze la sogs pa la gnod do //
analyzed: tshon dkar po la sogs pa ni bram ze la sogs pa la gnod do //
translated: If the rainbow is white, it harms the Brahmins.

original: ser skya dang / me'i mdog dang / me tog dmar zang zang rtsa ba ser ba lta bu'i 'ja' zug na yul du 'jigs pa 'byur ro //
analyzed: ser skya dang / me'i mdog dang / me tog dmar zang zang rtsa ba ser ba lta bu'i 'ja' zug na yul du 'jigs pa 'byur ro //
translated: If it is yellow, red, or like a flower with a red center and yellow base, it harms the country.

original: 'ja' sngon por zug na lo ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ja' sngon por zug na lo ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the rainbow is blue, the leaves will be ruined.

original: 'ja'i dbus nyi tshe zhig na char mi zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ja'i dbus nyi tshe zhig na char mi zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the rainbow appears only in the middle, the rain will not stop.

original: mtshan mo shar phyogs su 'ja' zug na rgyal po la gnod do //
analyzed: mtshan mo shar phyogs su 'ja' zug na rgyal po la gnod do //
translated: If the rainbow appears in the east at night, it harms the king.

original: nub phyogs su mtshan mo 'ja' zug na mi'i gtso bo la gnod do //🔽char 'bab pa'i tshe 'ja' zug na char 'chad do //
analyzed: nub phyogs su mtshan mo 'ja' zug na mi'i gtso bo la gnod do // char 'bab pa'i tshe 'ja' zug na char 'chad do //
translated: If the rainbow appears in the west at night, it harms the chief of men.🔽If the rainbow appears when it is raining, the rain will stop.

original: char mi 'bab pa'i tshe 'ja' zug na char 'bab po //
analyzed: char mi 'bab pa'i tshe 'ja' zug na char 'bab po //
translated: If the rainbow appears when it is not raining, it will rain.

original: shar phyogs su 'ja' zug na char 'bab bo //
analyzed: shar phyogs su 'ja' zug na char 'bab bo //
translated: If the rainbow appears in the east, it will rain.

original: lho phyogs la sogs pa phyogs gsum du 'ja' zug na bram ze la sogs pa la mchod pa mang po 'ong ngo //
analyzed: lho phyogs la sogs pa phyogs gsum du 'ja' zug na bram ze la sogs pa la mchod pa mang po 'ong ngo //
translated: If the rainbow appears in the three directions other than the south, many offerings will come to the Brahmins.

original: de bzhin du lho phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'ja' zug na rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs la gnod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du lho phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'ja' zug na rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs la gnod do //
translated: Likewise, if a rainbow appears in the south and moves to the west, it will harm the royalty, the priestly class, and the common people.

original: dus gsum gyi mtshams su 'ja' zug na yul 'jig par byed do //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi mtshams su 'ja' zug na yul 'jig par byed do //
translated: If a rainbow appears at the juncture of the three times, it will destroy the country.

original: nyi ma'i rtse la lho phyogs su 'ja' zug na mi la 'jigs pa 'ong ngo //
analyzed: nyi ma'i rtse la lho phyogs su 'ja' zug na mi la 'jigs pa 'ong ngo //
translated: If a rainbow appears in the south at sunrise, it will bring danger to people.

original: mtshams su 'ja' zug na bud med ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshams su 'ja' zug na bud med ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a rainbow appears at the juncture of the three times, it will bring misfortune to women.

original: lan gnyis su 'ja' zug na bde ba 'phel ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan gnyis su 'ja' zug na bde ba 'phel ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If a rainbow appears twice, it will increase happiness and bring good harvests.

original: tshes grangs bzang po dang / rgyu skar bzang po dang / yud tsam dang / byed pa dang / gza' bzang po dang / khyim pa dang / skabs bzang po'i tshe 'ja' zug na dge ba ste /
analyzed: tshes grangs bzang po dang / rgyu skar bzang po dang / yud tsam dang / byed pa dang / gza' bzang po dang / khyim pa dang / skabs bzang po'i tshe 'ja' zug na dge ba ste /
translated: If a rainbow appears at an auspicious time, an auspicious lunar mansion, an auspicious muhūrta, an auspicious deed, an auspicious planet, an auspicious house, or an auspicious occasion, it is virtuous.

original: rgyal po'i srid skye ste /
analyzed: rgyal po'i srid skye ste /
translated: It will bring about the birth of a king.

original: rkun po spa gong bar 'ong ngo //
analyzed: rkun po spa gong bar 'ong ngo //
translated: It will bring about the defeat of thieves.

original: de bzhin du nya 'dra ba dang / dbyug pa 'dra ba dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / @38a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du nya 'dra ba dang / dbyug pa 'dra ba dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / @38a * //
translated: Likewise, if a rainbow appears in the shape of a fish, a staff, or a gandharva city,

original: phyogs tshig pa dang bcas par snang ba yang tshul gong ma dang 'dra bar tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' la sogs pa bzang ngan gyi tshul gong ma dang 'dra bar gdon mi za bar rtogs pa'i mis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs tshig pa dang bcas par snang ba yang tshul gong ma dang 'dra bar tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' la sogs pa bzang ngan gyi tshul gong ma dang 'dra bar gdon mi za bar rtogs pa'i mis shes par bya'o //
translated: The directions may appear to be burning, but one should understand that this is just as in the previous case, and that the day, lunar mansion, planet, and so forth are good or bad just as before.

original: de lta bur snang ba gyur pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du char babs na zhi ba yin /
analyzed: de lta bur snang ba gyur pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du char babs na zhi ba yin /
translated: If it rains within seven days after such an appearance, it will be pacified.

original: legs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: legs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will be good.

original: 'ja' ltas kyi le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: 'ja' ltas kyi le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the twenty-second chapter, on the rainbow.

original: // / sa g-yo ba'i ltas kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa /
analyzed: // / sa g-yo ba'i ltas kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa /
translated: Chapter Twenty-Three: The Characteristics of the Signs of Earthquakes

original: de la chos ma yin pa'i mthu las byung ba'i dus su skar ma drag shul can dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig dang / tshes grangs mi bzad pa'i tshe sa g-yos na skye bo thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la chos ma yin pa'i mthu las byung ba'i dus su skar ma drag shul can dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig dang / tshes grangs mi bzad pa'i tshe sa g-yos na skye bo thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At the time when the power of non-Dharma arises, if there is an earthquake when the star Puṣya, the muhūrta, the kṣaṇa, and the lunar day are inauspicious, there will be a fear of misfortune for all beings.

original: tshes grangs bzang po'i tshe sa g-yos na rab tu dge ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshes grangs bzang po'i tshe sa g-yos na rab tu dge ba zhes bya'o //
translated: If there is an earthquake on an auspicious day, it is called “extremely virtuous.”

original: skar ma tshes grangs la sogs pa bzang ngan 'dres pa'i tshes g-yos na phan gnod kyi 'bras bu yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skar ma tshes grangs la sogs pa bzang ngan 'dres pa'i tshes g-yos na phan gnod kyi 'bras bu yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro //
translated: If there is an earthquake on a day that is a mixture of good and bad, such as a lunar mansion or lunar day, then the results of benefit and harm will also be mixed.

original: tshes grangs bzang po'i tshes g-yos na rgyal po dang / skye bos chos legs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshes grangs bzang po'i tshes g-yos na rgyal po dang / skye bos chos legs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: If there is an earthquake on an auspicious day, the king and people will obtain the fruit of good Dharma.

original: sa g-yos bzhin du yul gzhan du song na yul der gnas par 'gyur zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sa g-yos bzhin du yul gzhan du song na yul der gnas par 'gyur zhes bya ste /
translated: If one goes to another country while there is an earthquake, it is said that one will stay in that country.

original: de yang chos nyams pa'i nyes pa ma byas nas g-yos kyang legs par gyur te /
analyzed: de yang chos nyams pa'i nyes pa ma byas nas g-yos kyang legs par gyur te /
translated: Moreover, if the fault of Dharma decline is not committed, even if there is an earthquake, it will be good.

original: de dag tu char 'bab cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag tu char 'bab cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In those places, rain will fall and there will be great peace.

original: gnas lcags rnon po lhung pa'i sgra drag pos sa rab tu g-yos na skye bo 'thab cing 'khon pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas kyis zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas lcags rnon po lhung pa'i sgra drag pos sa rab tu g-yos na skye bo 'thab cing 'khon pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas kyis zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the earth quakes violently from the sound of sharp iron falling, people will fight, have grudges, and perish from famine and disease.

original: sa g-yo ba g-yas phyogs su 'gro zhing 'brug sgra ltar mnyen zhing zab pa'i sgra grags la /
analyzed: sa g-yo ba g-yas phyogs su 'gro zhing 'brug sgra ltar mnyen zhing zab pa'i sgra grags la /
translated: The earth moves to the right and a sound like thunder resounds softly and deeply.

original: dus tshigs dang tshes grangs bzang ba la ma 'khrul ba'i skabs su sa g-yos na dge bar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: dus tshigs dang tshes grangs bzang ba la ma 'khrul ba'i skabs su sa g-yos na dge bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: If the earth moves at a time when the seasons and the lunar day are unmistaken, it is virtuous.

original: / nam gza' skar drag po'i dus su sa g-yos pa'i dus na ri dgas dang bya rnams me 'bar ba bzhin du 'gyur la /
analyzed: / nam gza' skar drag po'i dus su sa g-yos pa'i dus na ri dgas dang bya rnams me 'bar ba bzhin du 'gyur la /
translated: When the earth moves at a time when the planets and stars are fierce, animals and birds become like a blazing fire.

original: gzhan yang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma'i ltas dag snang na 'jig rten du rab tu gnod pa drag po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma'i ltas dag snang na 'jig rten du rab tu gnod pa drag po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, if the signs of non-virtue appear in the world, a great calamity will occur.

original: rgyu skar dang / gza' dge ba'i dus su yang de ltar gyur na de'i tshe 'bras bu dge bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu skar dang / gza' dge ba'i dus su yang de ltar gyur na de'i tshe 'bras bu dge bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if it is a time when the lunar mansions and planets are virtuous, if it is like that, at that time the result will not be virtuous.

original: dge ba'i ltas kyi mtshan ma byung la /
analyzed: dge ba'i ltas kyi mtshan ma byung la /
translated: If the signs of virtuous omens arise,

original: bya rnams kyang khrag khrig lang long med cing rab tu zhi ba dang / rlung yang zhi bar gyur pa ni dge bas kyang rab tu dge ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: bya rnams kyang khrag khrig lang long med cing rab tu zhi ba dang / rlung yang zhi bar gyur pa ni dge bas kyang rab tu dge ba zhes bya ste /
translated: and if the birds are not agitated and are very peaceful, and if the wind is also peaceful, it is said to be very virtuous by virtue.

original: mi dge ba'i ltas ngan drag po zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i ltas ngan drag po zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The fierce inauspiciousness of non-virtue will be pacified.

original: sa g-yos pa'i 'og tu gal te char pa 'bab pa na de'i tshe bde ba @38b dang ; lo legs pa dang / nad med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa g-yos pa'i 'og tu gal te char pa 'bab pa na de'i tshe bde ba @38b dang ; lo legs pa dang / nad med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it rains after an earthquake, then there will be happiness, good harvests, and no disease.

original: sa g-yos pa'i rjes la skar mda' chen po lhung bar gyur na de'i tshe skye bo ltogs pa dang / mtshon dang / nad kyis zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa g-yos pa'i rjes la skar mda' chen po lhung bar gyur na de'i tshe skye bo ltogs pa dang / mtshon dang / nad kyis zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If a great meteor falls after an earthquake, then people will be hungry, and there will be destruction by weapons and disease.

original: nam sa g-yos pa'i rjes la rlung drag po lang sa pas gseg ma khyer zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i tshe na mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: nam sa g-yos pa'i rjes la rlung drag po lang sa pas gseg ma khyer zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i tshe na mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: If a strong wind arises after an earthquake, carrying gravel and dust, then famine will occur.

original: / sa g-yos shing 'gro ba dang / rlung ldang ba dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od rnams dang / 'di rnams mthun par 'gron bkra shis te dge'o //
analyzed: / sa g-yos shing 'gro ba dang / rlung ldang ba dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od rnams dang / 'di rnams mthun par 'gron bkra shis te dge'o //
translated: If an earthquake, wind, the light of the sun and moon, and so forth, are all in harmony, then it is an auspicious guest, virtuous.

original: de lta bu dang mi mthun par 'gro zhing sa g-yos na mi dge ste smad pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu dang mi mthun par 'gro zhing sa g-yos na mi dge ste smad pa yin no //
translated: If they move in a way that is not in harmony, then the earthquake is inauspicious and contemptible.

original: zla ba phyed phyed cing lan gsum gsum g-yos pa zla ba gcig la spyir sa lan drug g-yos par gyur na dgra'i tshogs 'ong bar ston to //
analyzed: zla ba phyed phyed cing lan gsum gsum g-yos pa zla ba gcig la spyir sa lan drug g-yos par gyur na dgra'i tshogs 'ong bar ston to //
translated: If the earth shakes three times every half month, and once every month, in general, the earth will shake six times a month, and this indicates the coming of an army of enemies.

original: yul gang du sa g-yo ba bstud pa der yang dang yang zhag gcig gam /
analyzed: yul gang du sa g-yo ba bstud pa der yang dang yang zhag gcig gam /
translated: In whatever country the earth shakes continuously, there will be a single day of trembling,

original: zhag bdun nam /
analyzed: zhag bdun nam /
translated: or seven days,

original: zhag bcu gcig gam /
analyzed: zhag bcu gcig gam /
translated: or eleven days,

original: zla ba phyed dam /
analyzed: zla ba phyed dam /
translated: or half a month,

original: zla ba re re zhing sa g-yo 'am /
analyzed: zla ba re re zhing sa g-yo 'am /
translated: or every month,

original: zla ba drug tu 'am /
analyzed: zla ba drug tu 'am /
translated: or for six months,

original: zla ba bcu'am /
analyzed: zla ba bcu'am /
translated: or for ten months,

original: lo gcig tu 'am /
analyzed: lo gcig tu 'am /
translated: or for one year,

original: lo bcu'i bar du'am /
analyzed: lo bcu'i bar du'am /
translated: or for ten years,

original: de bas kyang lhag par lan mang du g-yos sam /
analyzed: de bas kyang lhag par lan mang du g-yos sam /
translated: or more than that, many times.

original: de las nyis 'gyur du g-yos na yul phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang dmag dang 'khor du bcas pa ma rung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de las nyis 'gyur du g-yos na yul phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang dmag dang 'khor du bcas pa ma rung bar 'gyur //
translated: If it shakes twice as much as that, the country will be perfect, but the king, the army, and the retinue will be destroyed.

original: yul de rgyal po gzhan byed de /
analyzed: yul de rgyal po gzhan byed de /
translated: That country will be ruled by another king,

original: de yang yul der rab tu 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed pas yul de nyid dgon bar gyur nas ri dgas gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang yul der rab tu 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed pas yul de nyid dgon bar gyur nas ri dgas gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: and that king will also harm and injure that country, so that country will become a wilderness, and will become a place for wild animals to live.

original: tshul gong ma bzhin du dpyid zla tha chung sa las g-yos na gnod pa'i 'bras bu zhag bcu nas 'byung ngo //
analyzed: tshul gong ma bzhin du dpyid zla tha chung sa las g-yos na gnod pa'i 'bras bu zhag bcu nas 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the last spring month, the result will be harm, and it will occur after ten days.

original: dbyar zlar ba la sa g-yos na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag bcu gnyis na 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dbyar zlar ba la sa g-yos na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag bcu gnyis na 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the first summer month, the result will be a ripening, and it will occur after twelve days.

original: dbyar zla 'bring po las g-yos na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga na 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dbyar zla 'bring po las g-yos na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga na 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the middle summer month, the result will be a ripening, and it will occur after twenty-five days.

original: dbyar zla tha chung sa las g-yos na 'bras bu zhag bdun cu rtsa ldan 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dbyar zla tha chung sa las g-yos na 'bras bu zhag bdun cu rtsa ldan 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the last summer month, the result will be harm, and it will occur after seventy days.

original: ston zla ra ba las g-yos na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag brgyad na 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ston zla ra ba las g-yos na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag brgyad na 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the first autumn month, the result will be a ripening, and it will occur after eight days.

original: ston zla 'bring po las g-yos na 'bras bu zla ba gnyis na 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ston zla 'bring po las g-yos na 'bras bu zla ba gnyis na 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the middle autumn month, the result will be harm, and it will occur after two months.

original: ston zla tha chung sa las g-yos na 'bras bu zla ba gsum na 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ston zla tha chung sa las g-yos na 'bras bu zla ba gsum na 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the last autumn month, the result will be harm, and it will occur after three months.

original: dgun zlar ba las g-yos na 'bras bu zla ba gnyis na 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dgun zlar ba las g-yos na 'bras bu zla ba gnyis na 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the first winter month, the result will be harm, and it will occur after two months.

original: dgun zla 'bring po las g-yos na 'bras bu zhag lda bcu rtsa lnga na 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dgun zla 'bring po las g-yos na 'bras bu zhag lda bcu rtsa lnga na 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the middle month of winter, the results will occur after fifteen and a half days.

original: dgun zla tha chung sa las g-yos na 'bras bu zhag brgyad na 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dgun zla tha chung sa las g-yos na 'bras bu zhag brgyad na 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the last month of winter, the results will occur after eight days.

original: dpyid zlar ba las g-yos na 'bras bu ni zhag lnga bcu na 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dpyid zlar ba las g-yos na 'bras bu ni zhag lnga bcu na 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the first month of spring, the results will occur after fifty days.

original: dpyid zla 'bring po las g-yos na @39a * //
analyzed: dpyid zla 'bring po las g-yos na @39a * //
translated: If there is an earthquake in the middle month of spring,

original: zhag lnga bcu rtsa gsum na 'bras bu 'byung bar skar mkhan gyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhag lnga bcu rtsa gsum na 'bras bu 'byung bar skar mkhan gyis shes par bya'o //
translated: the astrologers should know that the results will occur after fifty-three days.

original: de ltar sa g-yos pa'i 'bras bu de ltar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar sa g-yos pa'i 'bras bu de ltar bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is how the results of earthquakes are explained.

original: de ltar zla ba'i ngo re re zhing sa g-yo ba'i dmigs kyang yar gyi tshes gcig dang / mar gyi tshes bcu drug dang / mar gyi tshes nyi shu gsum dag dang / yar gyi tshe sa bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dang / nyi shu dgu dang /
analyzed: de ltar zla ba'i ngo re re zhing sa g-yo ba'i dmigs kyang yar gyi tshes gcig dang / mar gyi tshes bcu drug dang / mar gyi tshes nyi shu gsum dag dang / yar gyi tshe sa bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dang / nyi shu dgu dang /
translated: Thus, in each month, the results of earthquakes should be examined on the first day of the waxing phase, the sixteenth day of the waning phase, the twenty-third day of the waning phase, the fourteenth day of the waxing phase, the fifteenth day of the waxing phase, the twenty-ninth day of the waning phase,

original: sum cu ste /
analyzed: sum cu ste /
translated: and the thirtieth day of the waning phase.

original: dus tshigs 'di rnams lta bu'i dus su sa g-yos pa'i 'bras bu ni tshul de ltar blta'o //
analyzed: dus tshigs 'di rnams lta bu'i dus su sa g-yos pa'i 'bras bu ni tshul de ltar blta'o //
translated: The effects of earthquakes at these times should be understood in this way.

original: sa g-yos pa'i ltas kyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o /
analyzed: sa g-yos pa'i ltas kyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o /
translated: This concludes the chapter on the omens of earthquakes, the twenty-third chapter of the great king of tantras called “The Shining Lamp.”

original: // / nam zla ba bcu gnyis kyi ngo kun la sa rtag par g-yos te /
analyzed: // / nam zla ba bcu gnyis kyi ngo kun la sa rtag par g-yos te /
translated: The earth always shakes in all twelve months.

original: shing yang 'gul /
analyzed: shing yang 'gul /
translated: The trees shake.

original: chu yang g-yos te /
analyzed: chu yang g-yos te /
translated: The water shakes.

original: mer mer byed cing /
analyzed: mer mer byed cing /
translated: It trembles.

original: de ltar dus tshigs dang / dus tshigs ma yin par g-yos te /🔽rlung langs pas shing yang bcag / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong 'dab dang / grong de na brten pa'i skye bo rnams med par gyur te ;
analyzed: de ltar dus tshigs dang / dus tshigs ma yin par g-yos te / rlung langs pas shing yang bcag / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong 'dab dang / grong de na brten pa'i skye bo rnams med par gyur te ;
translated: Thus, it shakes at the right time and at the wrong time.🔽Since the wind rises, the trees shake.🔽The villages, towns, hamlets, and cities in that place become empty,🔽and the people who live there are overwhelmed by wild animals.

original: gcan gzan gyi zil gyis gnon nas yul 'brog tu gyur te /
analyzed: gcan gzan gyi zil gyis gnon nas yul 'brog tu gyur te /
translated: The country becomes a wilderness.

original: de ltar sa g-yos pa ni gnod pa'i 'bras bu lo bco lnga nas yul phyogs der yang su yang mi gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sa g-yos pa ni gnod pa'i 'bras bu lo bco lnga nas yul phyogs der yang su yang mi gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that way, an earthquake that is the effect of harm will cause no one to live in that region for fifteen years.

original: rgyu skar smin drug gi nyi ma las g-yos na grong dang grong khyer la me bstud par shor te /
analyzed: rgyu skar smin drug gi nyi ma las g-yos na grong dang grong khyer la me bstud par shor te /
translated: If the sun moves from the lunar mansion of Mṛgaśirā, a fire will spread through the villages and towns.

original: shing rtsi yang tshig /
analyzed: shing rtsi yang tshig /
translated: Even the oily wood will burn.

original: gos nag po gyon pa'i sde dang / nor bu mkhan rnams dang / mgar ba dang / bram ze me 'byin pa'i spyod pa byed pa 'di rnams la mi dge /'byung khungs nas nor bu byung ba rnams dang / 'phel ba rnams kyang subs par 'gyur /
analyzed: gos nag po gyon pa'i sde dang / nor bu mkhan rnams dang / mgar ba dang / bram ze me 'byin pa'i spyod pa byed pa 'di rnams la mi dge /'byung khungs nas nor bu byung ba rnams dang / 'phel ba rnams kyang subs par 'gyur /
translated: The troops wearing black clothes, the jewelers, the blacksmiths, and the brahmins who perform the rites of fire will be unwholesome. The jewels that come from the mines and those that increase will be extinguished.

original: yul de la brten pa'i pa lang dang / shing rta 'dren pa'i mi dang / bram ze dang / 'dreg mkhan spu gri'i las byed pa dang / yul sin du zhes bya ba'i yul phyed kyi mi dang yul aam bsta dang / yul chu klung lnga zhes bya ba na gnas pa'i mi dang /
analyzed: yul de la brten pa'i pa lang dang / shing rta 'dren pa'i mi dang / bram ze dang / 'dreg mkhan spu gri'i las byed pa dang / yul sin du zhes bya ba'i yul phyed kyi mi dang yul aam bsta dang / yul chu klung lnga zhes bya ba na gnas pa'i mi dang /
translated: The cattle, the men who pull the carts, the brahmins, the barbers who perform the rites of the razor, the people of half the country of Sindhu, the people who live in the country of Ambaṣṭha, and the people who live in the country of Pañcaśarada

original: yul shi bzhes bya ba dang / yul ba si ti zhes bya ba dang / yul ta she ra ka zhes bya ba dang / yul brta ba dang // yul rta la dha na zhes bya ba dang // yul gangs khrod na gnas pa rnams dang /
analyzed: yul shi bzhes bya ba dang / yul ba si ti zhes bya ba dang / yul ta she ra ka zhes bya ba dang / yul brta ba dang // yul rta la dha na zhes bya ba dang // yul gangs khrod na gnas pa rnams dang /
translated: the country called Śiva, the country called Vāsittha, the country called Taśeraka, the country called Varata, the country called Tāla-dhāna, and the countries of the snow-clad mountains,

original: lho phyogs kyi lung pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi lung pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: and the people living in the southern valleys will be harmed.

original: de ltar sa g-yos pas gzi brjid nyams te nang drag pos 'debs /
analyzed: de ltar sa g-yos pas gzi brjid nyams te nang drag pos 'debs /
translated: Thus, the earth will shake, and the splendor will diminish. There will be internal strife,

original: ltogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: ltogs par 'gyur //
translated: and people will be hungry.

original: than chen dang / chom rkun @39b dang ; pha rol gyi dgra rnams kyis gnod pa drag po byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: than chen dang / chom rkun @39b dang ; pha rol gyi dgra rnams kyis gnod pa drag po byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: There will be great droughts, and harm will be done by thieves and enemies from abroad.

original: rgyu skar snar ma'i nyi ma la sa g-yos na sa bon thams cad chud zos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu skar snar ma'i nyi ma la sa g-yos na sa bon thams cad chud zos par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the earth shakes on a day of the lunar mansion Puṣya, all seeds will be destroyed.

original: sa la 'bru btab pa yang mi skye /
analyzed: sa la 'bru btab pa yang mi skye /
translated: Grains planted in the earth will not grow.

original: de dang 'dra bar rtsva yang dkon //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar rtsva yang dkon //
translated: Grass will be as rare as that.

original: nags khrod nas cung zad ci 'khrungs pa yang dkon no //
analyzed: nags khrod nas cung zad ci 'khrungs pa yang dkon no //
translated: Whatever little grows in the forest will be rare.

original: bud med sbrum ma rnams kyi rum rab tu mi bde /
analyzed: bud med sbrum ma rnams kyi rum rab tu mi bde /
translated: The bellies of pregnant women will be very uncomfortable.

original: mu ge dang / mtshon dang / nad kyis zad de /
analyzed: mu ge dang / mtshon dang / nad kyis zad de /
translated: [The world] will be emptied by famine, weapons, and disease.

original: skye bo sum cha gcig gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye bo sum cha gcig gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: One third of the people will remain.

original: mi'i dbang po che ba'i bdag nyid can dang / dpal dang ldan pa'i mi mchog rnams dang / bram ze gzi brjid can mang po dang / ba lang phyug po dang / dbang dang ldan pa dang / yul phi pa sha dang / yul sha ta ru dang /
analyzed: mi'i dbang po che ba'i bdag nyid can dang / dpal dang ldan pa'i mi mchog rnams dang / bram ze gzi brjid can mang po dang / ba lang phyug po dang / dbang dang ldan pa dang / yul phi pa sha dang / yul sha ta ru dang /
translated: The great lords of men, the glorious supreme men, the many powerful brahmins, the wealthy cattle owners, the powerful ones, the people of the country of Sha, the people of the country of Shatru,

original: yul sin dhu dang / yul aan da dang / chu bo ba ni sti'i 'gram na gnas pa dang / chu bo ae ra ba ti'i drung du gnas pa dang / yul ku dha na gnas pa'i mi dang / chu bo tsan tra bha ga zhes bya ba'i 'khor na gnas pa'i mi dang /
analyzed: yul sin dhu dang / yul aan da dang / chu bo ba ni sti'i 'gram na gnas pa dang / chu bo ae ra ba ti'i drung du gnas pa dang / yul ku dha na gnas pa'i mi dang / chu bo tsan tra bha ga zhes bya ba'i 'khor na gnas pa'i mi dang /
