translated: the people who live in the land of Śuddhasena, the people of the land of Malaya, the people of the land of Takṣaśilā, the people of the land of Bālikā, the people of the land of Saurāṣṭra, the people of the land of Kashmir, the people who live in the mountains of Varīśa in the land of Kāpiśa,🔽and the people of the land of the five rivers will be destroyed.

analyzed: rgyu skar snrubs la sa g-yos na rkang bzhi pa dang / rkang pa gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du phug na gnas pa rnams dang / yi dags sha za rnams dang / sems can gang dag ri la gnas pa rnams dang / mu ge myur du 'byung /
translated: If there is an earthquake in the constellation Hasta, [there will be harm to] quadrupeds, bipeds, and likewise to those living in holes, to hungry ghosts and flesh-eating spirits, to those beings living in mountains, and famine will quickly appear.

original: sa la chu yang myur du skams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa la chu yang myur du skams par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: dgra rnams ri drung du song nas de nas dga' bar gnas pa dang / chos kyi yo byad rnams dang / gang na nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa dang / rgun ra dang / bu ram shing gi khu ba dang / 'bras bu mngar po cung zad yod pa rnams dang /

translated: the forest of dukūla trees, various flowers, grains, seeds, various kinds of fruits, all the activities of the household, the various activities of planting and nurturing,

translated: the various activities of making zombies, the people of the land of Su, the people of the land of Gok, the people of the land of Kātyā, the people of the land of the cowherds, and so on,

translated: the people who live on the peaks, caves, and ponds of the mountains, the various quadrupeds, the ascetics who eat fruits and roots, and the people who live in the northern region of Kāśi, in a strong land, will be harmed by an earthquake.

translated: the people who hunt deer, the people born in an inferior birth, the people who are chickens, women, and who live on the banks of the great river Pakṣa, the people who live on both sides of the snow mountain,

analyzed: rgyu skar chu smad la sa g-yos na bzo bo rnams la gnod par 'gyur te /

analyzed: yul ga na ra'i mi rnams dang / yul ke ka ya dang / yul kha sha ba rnams dang / gu zan yul dang / yul ba gur na gnas pa ri brags pa gtum po rnam pa stong snyed dang / bru sha yul la sogs pa dang /
translated: The people of the land of Gana, the land of Kekaya, the land of Khasarpada, the land of Guzan, the land of Bagur, the fierce hill people numbering in the thousands, the land of Brusha,

translated: If there is an earthquake when Mars is on the ascendant, it is said that people who are honored by the king, people who study the Vedas, people who are learned in the treatises, people who know poetry, people from the land of Gandhara up to the land of Kosambhi,🔽people who live in the land of Metarasthana, the two lands of Sindhu, the land of Ujjayini, people from the land of Ujjayini, people from the land of Sagaka, people from the land of Lambaka, the land of Nagahara,

translated: the people of the land of Prālya, those who live in the southern valleys, the sages who live in the southern mountains, the people of the land called Cakravartī, the women with one breast,

analyzed: tha skar gyi do la rum du bu cha gas pa la mi dge'o //

analyzed: tha skar gyi dus su btsas pa la mi dge ste /

original: de phan chad lo gsum na mi bde ba 'byung ngam /
analyzed: de phan chad lo gsum na mi bde ba 'byung ngam /
translated: Three years from now, there will be misfortune.

original: de nas lo bcu na 'chi bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de nas lo bcu na 'chi bar 'gyur /

original: yul la ri da dang / yul ti gar ta dang / yul pa na tsa la'i skye bo rnams dang / yul aardzu na'i mi rnams dang / yul da ru dang / yul da na bya dang / yul sa ti na'i mi rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul la ri da dang / yul ti gar ta dang / yul pa na tsa la'i skye bo rnams dang / yul aardzu na'i mi rnams dang / yul da ru dang / yul da na bya dang / yul sa ti na'i mi rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The people of the countries of Riḍa, Tīgarta, Paṇacāla, Arjuni, Dhara, Danapāla, and Sātina will be harmed.

original: rgyu skar bra nye la sa g-yos na rkun po rnams la gnod pa cher 'gyur /
analyzed: rgyu skar bra nye la sa g-yos na rkun po rnams la gnod pa cher 'gyur /
translated: If there is an earthquake at the time of the lunar mansion Bharaṇī, there will be great harm to thieves.

original: rgyan po byed pa dang / mdud pa dang / sgo lcags 'byed cing rku ba dang / me long 'tshong ba dang / dbyig dug sbyor zhing sdud pa'i mi dang / 'khor lo byed pa dang ; btson srung dang / gtum po sdig can rnams dang /

translated: Those who gamble, those who make knots, those who open locks and steal, those who sell mirrors, those who mix poison and collect it, those who make wheels, those who guard prisoners, and those who are cruel and sinful will be harmed.

original: rkun po rnams dang / g-yo byed pa rnams dang / mi srun pa dang / phra ma byed pa dang / gdol pa dang / rigs ngan la sogs pa'i yul gyi mtha' na gnas pa rnams dang / rgya yul na rgya rnams dang / rgya dam pa rnams dang /
analyzed: rkun po rnams dang / g-yo byed pa rnams dang / mi srun pa dang / phra ma byed pa dang / gdol pa dang / rigs ngan la sogs pa'i yul gyi mtha' na gnas pa rnams dang / rgya yul na rgya rnams dang / rgya dam pa rnams dang /
translated: the thieves, the swindlers, the violent, the slanderers, the untouchables, the outcasts, and so on, who live in the border regions; the Chinese, the Chinese masters,

analyzed: yul dga' ba bzang po zhes bya ba rnams dang / yul sya ba na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / chu bo chen po si ta zhes bya ba'i 'gram na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dang / mtsho ma dros pa yid bzhin zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten rnams la grags pa de la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams dang /
translated: and the people who live in the land called Good Joy, the people who live in the land of Syabana, the people who live on the banks of the great river called Sita, and the people of the world of the wish-fulfilling lake called Anavatapta, who are known to be free from desire.

original: rig sngags grub pa dang / rig 'dzin gyi tshogs rnams dang / drang srong thub pa rnams kyis kyang bsnyen par bya ba shing 'dzambu'i skye bo mang po gnas pa dang / ke la se ti sa'i gangs dang / gangs mangs te nor bu can gyi ri dang /
analyzed: rig sngags grub pa dang / rig 'dzin gyi tshogs rnams dang / drang srong thub pa rnams kyis kyang bsnyen par bya ba shing 'dzambu'i skye bo mang po gnas pa dang / ke la se ti sa'i gangs dang / gangs mangs te nor bu can gyi ri dang /
translated: The place is frequented by many beings, including accomplished knowledge mantras, hosts of knowledge holders, and sages.

original: spos ngad ldang ba gangs ltar go dang / de bzhin du su ri pa sha zhes bya ba ngos bzad ba dang / ri dang ri sa bar ni zhes bya ba dang / byang phyogs ngos dang / gling rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dang /
analyzed: spos ngad ldang ba gangs ltar go dang / de bzhin du su ri pa sha zhes bya ba ngos bzad ba dang / ri dang ri sa bar ni zhes bya ba dang / byang phyogs ngos dang / gling rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dang /
translated: There are the snow mountains of Kailash, the snow mountains of Manosarovar, the snow mountains of Ngang-nga, and the snow mountains of Sudarshan.🔽There are many different kinds of islands, and in the mountains and valleys live many hosts of yakshas, bhutas, rakshasas, gandharvas, and rakshasas, as well as accomplished knowledge holders and nagas.

original: ri rad rod dag na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / srin po'i tshogs mang po dag dang / grub pa dang / rig 'dzin dang / klu rnams dang / de bzhin du sman rnam pa stong snyed la @45a * //🔽gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ri rad rod dag na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / srin po'i tshogs mang po dag dang / grub pa dang / rig 'dzin dang / klu rnams dang / de bzhin du sman rnam pa stong snyed la @45a * //🔽gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: There are also many thousands of different kinds of medicinal plants.

analyzed: de ltar sa g-yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du sa la phan pa'i sprin sngo gnag 'jam po mig bsku ba'i sman gyi mdog ri chen po 'dra ba las 'brug sgra zab mor sgrog cing nye bar 'brug sgra drag la glog rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyu
translated: In that way, after the earthquake, for up to seven days, a beneficial cloud for the earth, dark blue, smooth, the color of eye medicine, like a great mountain, from which deep thunder resounds, and nearby, thunder roars strongly, and various kinds of lightning🔽flash.

original: zhing / nam mkha' la sngon po shur shur po lta bu snang ba'am /
analyzed: zhing / nam mkha' la sngon po shur shur po lta bu snang ba'am /

original: sgra 'byung ba'am /
analyzed: sgra 'byung ba'am /

original: skar mda' lta bu med la rlung me drag pa ldang zhing tshub ma lta bu mi sdug pa ni med /
analyzed: skar mda' lta bu med la rlung me drag pa ldang zhing tshub ma lta bu mi sdug pa ni med /
translated: Or a meteor-like wind rises strongly, and there is no unpleasant whirlwind.

original: sprin gyi gzugs bkra shis kyi ri mo sna tshogs dang / dpang po rdo rje lta bu snang ba dang / nang par nyi ma 'char ba dang / nyi ma nub nas zla ba 'char ba'i tshe sprin gyis mchog par char pa dang / nam mkha' sprin dal la snyoms pa 'jam po'i gzugs rgyang ring por song ba glog phan tshun du 'phro ba'i sprin de lta bu ni dge ba'i mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: sprin gyi gzugs bkra shis kyi ri mo sna tshogs dang / dpang po rdo rje lta bu snang ba dang / nang par nyi ma 'char ba dang / nyi ma nub nas zla ba 'char ba'i tshe sprin gyis mchog par char pa dang / nam mkha' sprin dal la snyoms pa 'jam po'i gzugs rgyang ring por song ba glog phan tshun du 'phro ba'i sprin de lta bu ni dge ba'i mtshan ma yin no //
translated: The forms of clouds are various auspicious patterns, and the appearance of vajra-like witnesses, and at dawn the rising sun, and when the sun has set and the moon is rising, the clouds are filled with rain, and the sky is filled with slow, even, gentle forms of clouds that go far away, with lightning flashing back and forth. Such clouds are auspicious signs.

original: sprin 'jam la dal snyoms te /
analyzed: sprin 'jam la dal snyoms te /
translated: Clouds are soft, slow, and even,

original: bar chad med cing sprin gyi gzugs lag pa mi snang ba de lta bur snang na sprin mtshan ma de lta bu dang ldan pa ni lha'i dbang po'i sa g-yos bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: bar chad med cing sprin gyi gzugs lag pa mi snang ba de lta bur snang na sprin mtshan ma de lta bu dang ldan pa ni lha'i dbang po'i sa g-yos bar bstan pa yin no //
translated: without obstacles, and the forms of clouds do not appear with hands. If they appear like that, such clouds with such signs indicate the shaking of the realm of the lord of gods.

original: de ltar gang dang gang du sa g-yos pa'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu'i dmigs ni 'jigs shing dngangs pa med par yid rton la sa bon thams cad thob shig / las dang 'tsho nam rnams kyang gyis shig / rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur bar yad bstan to ;
analyzed: de ltar gang dang gang du sa g-yos pa'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu'i dmigs ni 'jigs shing dngangs pa med par yid rton la sa bon thams cad thob shig / las dang 'tsho nam rnams kyang gyis shig / rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur bar yad bstan to ;
translated: Engage in work and livelihood, and you will be victorious.

original: / tshong pa yang de'i tshe kun du song yang 'jigs pa med do //
analyzed: / tshong pa yang de'i tshe kun du song yang 'jigs pa med do //
translated: At that time, even merchants can travel without fear.

original: yang sa g-yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du nam mkha' la sprin gyis khebs te /
analyzed: yang sa g-yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du nam mkha' la sprin gyis khebs te /
translated: After the earthquake, for seven days the sky will be covered with clouds.

original: thar chags su sprin bal ltar dal snyoms song la /
analyzed: thar chags su sprin bal ltar dal snyoms song la /
translated: The clouds will move slowly and evenly, like cotton wool.

original: nub phyogs su nam mkha' la chu srin gyis pa gsod pa dang / sbal ba rnams dang / nya dang / chu srin 'dra ba'i sprin gyi gzugs snang la nang nub tu nyi ma dang zla ba 'char ba'i tshe sprin gyis bsgribs pa med pa de ltar snang ba'i mtshan ma ni chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa g-yos pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: nub phyogs su nam mkha' la chu srin gyis pa gsod pa dang / sbal ba rnams dang / nya dang / chu srin 'dra ba'i sprin gyi gzugs snang la nang nub tu nyi ma dang zla ba 'char ba'i tshe sprin gyis bsgribs pa med pa de ltar snang ba'i mtshan ma ni chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa g-yos pa zhes bya ste /
translated: In the west, the signs of the appearance of the forms of clouds like sea monsters, frogs, fish, and sea monsters in the sky at dawn and dusk, when the sun and moon rise, are called the earthquake of the water mandala.

original: de ltar sa g-yos pa'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu yang drang srong chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar sa g-yos pa'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu yang drang srong chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bstan par bya ste /
translated: Thus, the beneficial and harmful results of earthquakes should be taught just as seen by the great sages.

original: thang bu dang / ri ngos dang / zhing dang / mtsho 'gram dang / de dag tu sa bon thob shig dang / sa dma' ba dang / ha cang chu che ba'i sa dang / 'dam rdzab can du btab na ni ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thang bu dang / ri ngos dang / zhing dang / mtsho 'gram dang / de dag tu sa bon thob shig dang / sa dma' ba dang / ha cang chu che ba'i sa dang / 'dam rdzab can du btab na ni ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Sow seeds on plains, hillsides, fields, and lake shores, but if planted in low-lying areas, excessively wet areas, or muddy areas, they will be spoiled.

original: tshul de lta bur sa g-yos pa ni bkra shis te chu'i sa g-yos pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshul de lta bur sa g-yos pa ni bkra shis te chu'i sa g-yos pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Such an earthquake is auspicious and is called the earthquake of the water mandala.

original: yang sa g-yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun @45b tshun chad du rlung drag po langs la /
analyzed: yang sa g-yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun @45b tshun chad du rlung drag po langs la /
translated: Moreover, after an earthquake, for up to seven days, a strong wind will blow.

original: nang par dang nub kar nyi ma dang zla ba dmar ser du snang ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma snang bar mthong na de ni rlung gi sa g-yos pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: nang par dang nub kar nyi ma dang zla ba dmar ser du snang ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma snang bar mthong na de ni rlung gi sa g-yos pa zhes bya ste /
translated: If one sees such a sign as the sun and moon appearing reddish-yellow in the morning and evening, that is called an earthquake caused by wind.🔽Listen to the explanation of the beneficial and harmful results of that:

original: de'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu bstan pa nyon cig / de'i tshe shes rab can bdag gar yang mi 'gro bar go ste /
analyzed: de'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu bstan pa nyon cig / de'i tshe shes rab can bdag gar yang mi 'gro bar go ste /
translated: At that time, the wise should understand not to go anywhere,🔽and stay in a place protected by weapons, a fortress, or a trench.

original: 'dug la mtshon cha bskyab pa'i gcan rtsig pa dang / 'obs brko ba gyis shig / rgyal po pha rol po dang / mtshams gcig tu 'dug pa dang rtsod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dug la mtshon cha bskyab pa'i gcan rtsig pa dang / 'obs brko ba gyis shig / rgyal po pha rol po dang / mtshams gcig tu 'dug pa dang rtsod par 'gyur te /
translated: There will be a dispute with the king of a neighboring country,

original: skye bo la 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye bo la 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and danger will arise for the people.

original: de ltar sa g-yos pa thams cad ni lhag par mi rnams la gnod pa 'byung bar bsgrags te /
analyzed: de ltar sa g-yos pa thams cad ni lhag par mi rnams la gnod pa 'byung bar bsgrags te /
translated: Thus, all earthquakes are proclaimed to bring harm to humans.

original: de lta bu ni rlung gi sa g-yos pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu ni rlung gi sa g-yos pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is called an earthquake caused by wind.

original: yang sa g-yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du de'i tshe skar mda' shin tu drag po ltung ba dang / nang nub kyi tshe dmar po gyur la /
analyzed: yang sa g-yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du de'i tshe skar mda' shin tu drag po ltung ba dang / nang nub kyi tshe dmar po gyur la /
translated: and at dawn and dusk, it will turn red,

original: nyi ma dang zla ba yang dmar por snang ste /
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba yang dmar por snang ste /
translated: and the sun and moon will also appear red.

original: tshul de ltar mthong na de ni me'i sa g-yos pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: tshul de ltar mthong na de ni me'i sa g-yos pa zhes bya ste /
translated: If one sees such a way, that is called an earthquake of fire.

original: khyim rnams bsrungs kyang mes tshigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyim rnams bsrungs kyang mes tshigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if the houses are protected, they will be burned by fire.

original: du ba dang / me dang / mtshon rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: du ba dang / me dang / mtshon rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: Smoke, fire, and weapons will appear.

original: zla ba dgur char mi 'bab ste /
analyzed: zla ba dgur char mi 'bab ste /
translated: For nine months, there will be no rain.

original: zhing tha bar lus par 'gyur /
analyzed: zhing tha bar lus par 'gyur /
translated: The fields will be left barren.

original: de ltar sa g-yos pa ni ngan cing mi dge ste /
analyzed: de ltar sa g-yos pa ni ngan cing mi dge ste /
translated: In that way, an earthquake is bad and non-virtuous.

original: me'i sa g-yos pa zhes bya'o //🔽de la snga dro sa g-yos na rgyal po dang / dmag gi dpung dang ldan pa /
analyzed: me'i sa g-yos pa zhes bya'o // de la snga dro sa g-yos na rgyal po dang / dmag gi dpung dang ldan pa /
translated: It is called an earthquake of fire.🔽If it earthquakes in the morning, it is non-virtuous for the king and his army,

original: rta dang / glang po che dang / dmag dpon dang / blon por bcas pa la mi dge'o //
analyzed: rta dang / glang po che dang / dmag dpon dang / blon por bcas pa la mi dge'o //
translated: together with his horses, elephants, generals, and ministers.

original: nyi ma gung la sa g-yos na nad kyis 'debs so //
analyzed: nyi ma gung la sa g-yos na nad kyis 'debs so //
translated: If it earthquakes at noon, there will be a disease.

original: phyi ma red sa g-yos na ba lang dang / phyugs dang / dmangs rigs dang / de bzhin du rje'u rigs rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi ma red sa g-yos na ba lang dang / phyugs dang / dmangs rigs dang / de bzhin du rje'u rigs rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: to the śūdra caste, and likewise to the vaiśya caste.🔽If it occurs in the morning, at sunset, or at midnight, it is harmful to thieves,

original: nang par dang / nyi ma nub pa dang / nam gyi gung dus mtshams su sa g-yos na rkun po dang / gos dmar po gyon pa'i mi rnams la mi dge'o //
analyzed: nang par dang / nyi ma nub pa dang / nam gyi gung dus mtshams su sa g-yos na rkun po dang / gos dmar po gyon pa'i mi rnams la mi dge'o //
translated: to people who wear red clothes, and so forth.🔽If it occurs at night, at dusk, it is harmful to those who do harm, to thieves who live in border regions,

original: mtshan mo srod la sa g-yos na gnod pa byed pa dang / mtha' 'khob na gnas pa'i rkun po rnams dang / ma ning rnams dang / mtshan gyur pa rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / tshong spogs byed pa'i tshong pa dang / zhing rmed pa la mi dge'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo srod la sa g-yos na gnod pa byed pa dang / mtha' 'khob na gnas pa'i rkun po rnams dang / ma ning rnams dang / mtshan gyur pa rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / tshong spogs byed pa'i tshong pa dang / zhing rmed pa la mi dge'o //
translated: to neuters, to hermaphrodites, to the wealthy, to merchants who trade, and to farmers.

original: zla ba mar gyi ngo'i nam gung la sa g-yos na gtum po drag shul can ngan byed pa rnams la mi dge'o //
analyzed: zla ba mar gyi ngo'i nam gung la sa g-yos na gtum po drag shul can ngan byed pa rnams la mi dge'o //
translated: If it occurs at midnight in the waning moon, it is harmful to violent, cruel, and evil people.

original: zla ba yar gyi ngo'i nam chung la sa g-yos na mchod sbyin byed pa'i yo byad dang / bram ze mchod sbyin byed pa rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba yar gyi ngo'i nam chung la sa g-yos na mchod sbyin byed pa'i yo byad dang / bram ze mchod sbyin byed pa rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If there is an earthquake at dawn in the waxing period of the moon, it will harm the materials for making offerings and the brahmins who make offerings.

original: sa g-yos kyi le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o /🔽// / nyi ma @46a * //
analyzed: sa g-yos kyi le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o / // / nyi ma @46a * //
translated: The twenty-fourth chapter on earthquakes.

original: dang zla ba'i 'od dang / gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan ma bstan pa /
analyzed: dang zla ba'i 'od dang / gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan ma bstan pa /
translated: The signs of the light and reflection of the sun and moon.

original: yul gang du nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma dang 'dra bar nam mkha' la snang na de'i lho byang gi phyogs kun du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs rab tu gsal ba yang ma yin //
analyzed: yul gang du nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma dang 'dra bar nam mkha' la snang na de'i lho byang gi phyogs kun du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs rab tu gsal ba yang ma yin //
translated: If the sky appears like the sun when the sun rises in a certain place, then in all the southern and northern directions, the form of the sun's orb is not very clear.

original: 'od zer yang mi gsal la /
analyzed: 'od zer yang mi gsal la /
translated: The light rays are also not clear.

original: sprin gyis kyang nam kun chod na de ni char pa 'bab pa yin te /
analyzed: sprin gyis kyang nam kun chod na de ni char pa 'bab pa yin te /
translated: If the sky is always covered with clouds, then rain will fall.

original: dbyar gyi tshe ni nyi ma 'dra ba rtag par yang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dbyar gyi tshe ni nyi ma 'dra ba rtag par yang 'byung ngo //
translated: In the summer, it always appears like the sun.

original: dus 'di ma yin pa dus gzhan gyi tshe nyi ma 'dra ba snang na 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus 'di ma yin pa dus gzhan gyi tshe nyi ma 'dra ba snang na 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it appears like the sun at a time other than this, then danger will arise.

original: yul gang du nyi ma 'dra ba dkar po shar na yul dang bram ze rnams la mi rung ngo //
analyzed: yul gang du nyi ma 'dra ba dkar po shar na yul dang bram ze rnams la mi rung ngo //
translated: If the sun-like object arises white in color, it is not good for the country and the Brahmins.

original: nyi ma 'dra ba'i kha dog dmar po shar na rgyal rigs rnams dang / mtshon cha thogs pas 'tsho ba la gnod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma 'dra ba'i kha dog dmar po shar na rgyal rigs rnams dang / mtshon cha thogs pas 'tsho ba la gnod par shes par bya'o //
translated: If the sun-like object arises red in color, it should be understood as harmful to the Kshatriyas and those who make a living with weapons.

original: nyi ma 'dra ba kha dog ser po'am kha dog sngon por 'gyur na rje'u rigs rnams dang / ba lang dang / phyugs kyis 'tsho ba'i mi rnams la gnod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma 'dra ba kha dog ser po'am kha dog sngon por 'gyur na rje'u rigs rnams dang / ba lang dang / phyugs kyis 'tsho ba'i mi rnams la gnod par shes par bya'o //
translated: If the sun-like object becomes yellow or blue in color, it should be understood as harmful to the Vaishyas and those who make a living with cows and cattle.

original: gal te yul gang dang gang du nyi ma 'dra ba kha dog nag por shar na dmangs rigs rnams la gnod pa dang / char pa cher 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te yul gang dang gang du nyi ma 'dra ba kha dog nag por shar na dmangs rigs rnams la gnod pa dang / char pa cher 'gyur ro //
translated: If the sun-like object arises black in color in any country, it is harmful to the Shudras and there will be heavy rain.

original: gal te nyi ma'i g-yas rol du nyi ma 'dra ba byung na lho phyogs su 'jigs pa cher 'byung //
analyzed: gal te nyi ma'i g-yas rol du nyi ma 'dra ba byung na lho phyogs su 'jigs pa cher 'byung //
translated: If the sun-like object appears to the right of the sun, there will be great danger in the south.

original: zhag bdun tshun chad char 'bab par bshad do //
analyzed: zhag bdun tshun chad char 'bab par bshad do //
translated: It is explained that rain will fall within seven days.

original: nyi ma'i byang phyogs ni nyi ma 'dra bar kha dog dkar por snang ba byung na de ni byang phyogs kyi rgyal po la 'jigs pa cher 'byung //
analyzed: nyi ma'i byang phyogs ni nyi ma 'dra bar kha dog dkar por snang ba byung na de ni byang phyogs kyi rgyal po la 'jigs pa cher 'byung //
translated: If the north of the sun appears white, like the sun, then in the north of the king there will be a great fear.

original: char mi 'bab /
analyzed: char mi 'bab /
translated: There will be no rain.

original: mu ge 'byung /
analyzed: mu ge 'byung /
translated: There will be famine.

original: phan tshun du 'thab par 'gyur /
analyzed: phan tshun du 'thab par 'gyur /
translated: There will be mutual fighting.

original: gal te yul gang du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar bar snang na btsod kyi kha dog ltar dmar la /
analyzed: gal te yul gang du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar bar snang na btsod kyi kha dog ltar dmar la /
translated: If in any country the orb of the sun appears red, like the color of vermilion,

analyzed: gal te sngon po yang snang na zla ba lnga na rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de lta bu byung na de'i rjes la ltas ngan drag po 'byung ste /
translated: If such an event occurs, then after that a terrible bad omen will appear.

analyzed: rgyal po 'thab cing gsod pa dang / khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

original: nam nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na me skyes pa'i gzugs 'dra ba go dang bcas pa gsal bar snang na zla ba bzhi tshun chad du rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: nyi ma shi na yang zla ba dang 'dra bar @47a * //
translated: If the sun dies, it should be viewed in the same way as the moon.

translated: At night, from the waxing moon to the planets, the moon is eclipsed and goes away. The harm of each of them is shown separately.

original: spyir ni rgyal po dang / mi dam pa ma rung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: spyir ni rgyal po dang / mi dam pa ma rung bar 'gyur //
translated: In general, the king and the best people become bad.

original: char pa ha cang che ba dang / bla ma ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal srid ma rung bar spyir ston to //
analyzed: char pa ha cang che ba dang / bla ma ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal srid ma rung bar spyir ston to //
translated: There is too much rain, the guru becomes bad, and the kingdom is generally shown to become bad.

original: zla ba'i steng na pa sangs kyis mnan te song na rgyal po ngan pa ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba'i steng na pa sangs kyis mnan te song na rgyal po ngan pa ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: On the moon, Venus eclipses and goes away, and the bad king becomes bad.

translated: On the moon, Mars and Saturn eclipse and go away, and there is fear of hunger, and the occurrence of fierce quarrels and great fear.

original: zla ba la phod mjug rings kyis non te song na mu ge dang / mtshon gyis 'gyed par ston te //
analyzed: zla ba la phod mjug rings kyis non te song na mu ge dang / mtshon gyis 'gyed par ston te //

analyzed: zla ba la gza' lag gis non te song na lo legs pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the moon is eclipsed by Mars, there will be a good harvest and happiness.

analyzed: de ltar zla ba'i steng na phar gza' rnams kyis non cing phug ste song ba'i 'bras bu de ltar bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the results of the planets eclipsing and piercing the moon are taught.

translated: The result of the planets eclipsing the moon is that the form of the moon increases greatly due to the moon being eclipsed, and its light becomes exceptionally great, which is called victorious.

original: gal te pham par gyur te /
analyzed: gal te pham par gyur te /
translated: If it is defeated,

analyzed: mthu rtsal bri ba na zla ba 'dar zhing g-yon pham pa zhes bya'o //

translated: If you go there, having been purified by the smoke offering, you will reach the land of Mantrā, the land of Bantra, the land of Gagada, the land of Damotra, the land of Kubara, the land of Mar, the land of Saragar,🔽the land of Khasha, the land of Bulintra, the land of Kekela, Kashmir, Persia, the land of the hermits, the land of the female king, the land of Upa,

translated: The people of the land of Prati, the people of the land of Talada, the people of the ten lands, and the people living on the southern side of the snow mountains, together with their relatives, will be destroyed within seven months.

original: nam zla ba 'od gsal ba la phur bus phug ste song na yul pa sa ta dang / yul sin dha dang / yul gan dh'a ra dang / ri khrod na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / bag le'i yul dang / sog le'u yul gyi lung pa'i ljon nas ri khrod pa brgya stong snyed dang /
analyzed: nam zla ba 'od gsal ba la phur bus phug ste song na yul pa sa ta dang / yul sin dha dang / yul gan dh'a ra dang / ri khrod na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / bag le'i yul dang / sog le'u yul gyi lung pa'i ljon nas ri khrod pa brgya stong snyed dang /
translated: If one strikes with the dagger at a time when the moon is bright, the people of the land of Pāśa, the people of the land of Sindhu, the people of the land of Gandhara, the people living in the mountains, the people of the land of Bakula, and the people of the land of Sog-le, from the valleys to the mountain retreats, and the hundreds of thousands of mountain hermits,

analyzed: kha che yul gyi mi la zla ba bcu tshun chad kyis gnod par the tshom med par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: nam zla ba'i 'od gsal ba mig dmar gyis phug na rgyal po yul gzhan du 'gro ba'am /

original: rgyal srid bya bar brtson pa'am /
analyzed: rgyal srid bya bar brtson pa'am /

original: rgyal srid byed par zhugs pa la ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal srid byed par zhugs pa la ma rung bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bzhon pa'i rta rnams zad par 'gyur //

analyzed: phan tshun du dbye zhing gnod pa dang / dug dang mtshon mang pos ma rung bar 'gyur ;

analyzed: dpung dang ldan pa'i dus dang / dang tshul la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i mi rnams dang / yul lho phyogs na gnas shing rten pa'i mi rnams la zla ba drug gis 'jigs pa 'byung bar ston to //
translated: and the people who are powerful and have good fortune and so on, and the people who live and dwell in the southern countries, will be shown to have danger for six months.

translated: If the moon is pierced by the planet Saturn on a Saturday, the chief brahmins, the king, the parasol-bearer, and the army will engage in battle.

analyzed: sde'i gtso bo dpon tshan rnams 'thab par 'gyur //

translated: The people of the city, the merchants on the road, the people of Achu, the people of Gosa, the people of

analyzed: aa bi sha ha'i mi dang / yul ga shud tra'i mi dang / yul ma la ba dang / yul aa pi ra dang / mya ngan rnams dang / yul mang ba rnams dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang /
translated: Avishas, the people of Kashmira, the people of Malava, the people of Aparanta, the people of Magadha, the people of many countries, the cattle, the donkeys, the camels,

analyzed: 'di rnams rgyal mtshan du byed pa'i yul rnams ma rung ba dang / yul rus pa can du 'gyur ro ;
translated: and the people of these countries that make flags will be destroyed, and the countries will become like skeletons.

analyzed: / yul de rnams kyi mi la zla ba bcu bzhi na sdig pa zhi ba dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: The people of these countries will have fourteen days of peace from their sins.

original: nam gza' lag gis zla ba phug na lo legs /
analyzed: nam gza' lag gis zla ba phug na lo legs /
translated: If the moon is pierced by the planet Rahu, there will be a good harvest.

original: nad med char pa legs par 'bab /
analyzed: nad med char pa legs par 'bab /
translated: There will be no disease, and the rain will fall well.

original: skye bo la gnod pa med cing bde ba dang / zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye bo la gnod pa med cing bde ba dang / zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: People will be free from harm, happy, and peaceful.

original: zla ba phod mjug rings kyis phug ste song la /
analyzed: zla ba phod mjug rings kyis phug ste song la /
translated: If the moon is pierced by Ketu and passes through,

analyzed: gal te skar thod las dud pa 'thul na mi dpa' bo dang / mtshon gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang / chom rkun byed pa'i mi rnams gzhan gyi mthu rtsal dang / gnod pa dang / drag shul gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: if smoke emerges from the lunar mansion, then men who are heroes, who make a living with weapons, and men who are thieves will die through the strength, harm, and violence of others.

analyzed: yang gal te zla ba de la gza' gzhan gyis 'bugs shing zla ba'i ngos la 'dud cing reg par song na mtshon gyi gnod pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung ngo //
translated: Moreover, if the moon is pierced by another planet and the moon's face bows and touches, various harms from weapons will occur.

analyzed: la te zla ba'i nang du gza' rnams song ste nub na rgyal po 'chi ba dang / lus dang nor yang ma rung bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: yang btsas pa'i bla skar gyi nang du gza' spyang ki zhugs pa 'am //

analyzed: zla ba la gza' spyang ki zhugs la skar mda' zla ba la phog na rgyal po 'chi'o //

translated: If the light rays of the moon and the planet meet and the planet presses down on the moon and touches it, then the newly arisen planet will defeat the previously existing one, and the king will destroy and devour the people.

original: zla ba me tog padma dang me tog ku mu da dang 'dra //
analyzed: zla ba me tog padma dang me tog ku mu da dang 'dra //
translated: The moon is like a flower, a lotus, and a kumuda flower.

original: tshes grangs bzhin du zla ba skye zhing shas cher snang na /
analyzed: tshes grangs bzhin du zla ba skye zhing shas cher snang na /
translated: If the moon waxes and appears more and more like the lunar days,

analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'od zer ldan te nyams pa med par 'gro ba yin /

original: de ltar 'od zer bsil ldan mi rnams rgyal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar 'od zer bsil ldan mi rnams rgyal bar 'gyur //

original: zla ba 'char zhing 'gro bar bshad pa'o /
analyzed: zla ba 'char zhing 'gro bar bshad pa'o /

analyzed: // / rgyu skar dang / rgyu skar gyi khyim gyi nang du gza' mig dmar zhugs pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa /
translated: The signs of the planet Mars entering the lunar mansions and the houses of the lunar mansions are explained.

analyzed: rgyu skar rgyu skar gyi khyim gang yang rung ba'i nang du gza' mig dmar 'od kyi mdog 'jam pa dang ldan zhing chen por 'gyur te /
translated: If Mars is in any of the lunar mansions, it becomes large and has a smooth, reddish glow.

original: zla ba brgyad dam /
analyzed: zla ba brgyad dam /
translated: It enters and remains there for eight months,

original: zla ba bdun gyi bar du zhugs shing 'dug pa las 'od kyi kha dog dang / bongs che ba nyams na de ni mi dge ba yin te /
analyzed: zla ba bdun gyi bar du zhugs shing 'dug pa las 'od kyi kha dog dang / bongs che ba nyams na de ni mi dge ba yin te /
translated: or seven months. If the color and size of its light diminishes, that is inauspicious.

analyzed: rgyu skar gang dang gang gi nang du gza' mig @48b dmar zhugs pa de nyid la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever lunar mansion Mars enters, it will bring harm to that very [lunar mansion].

analyzed: gza' mig dmar tshul de lta bur zhugs pa ni skye bo rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Mars entering in that way will bring harm to people.

analyzed: yang gza' mig dmar yon par 'gro zhing 'jug pa dang / phyir yang 'khor zhing zhugs pa dang / mig dmar gyi 'od dang mdog nyams pa dang / gza' mig dmar rgyu skar dang nye zhing 'od 'dres pa dang / mig dmar las dud pa 'thul ba dang /
translated: Moreover, if Mars enters crookedly, or enters again after having gone out, or if the light and color of Mars diminishes, or if Mars is near a lunar mansion and its light is mixed with [the lunar mansion's light], or if smoke comes from Mars,

original: 'bar ba dang / mig dmar gyi rtse mo lus 'od zer dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / phan tshun du 'pho zhing 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: 'bar ba dang / mig dmar gyi rtse mo lus 'od zer dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / phan tshun du 'pho zhing 'gro ba'am /
translated: the blazing of the eyes, the peak of Mars being endowed with light, and the mutual transference and movement.

original: lam gcig tu 'dug la 'od dmar po 'am /
analyzed: lam gcig tu 'dug la 'od dmar po 'am /
translated: [If] the head of Mars is radiant with light, and [Mars] moves to another [place] or [if] it is in one place, [and] there is red light

original: yang na dud pa mi sdug pa cher 'thul na gnod pa byed pa 'dod pa de ni rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na dud pa mi sdug pa cher 'thul na gnod pa byed pa 'dod pa de ni rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: or a great, unpleasant smoke, [then] the one who wishes to harm will die.

original: yang na gza' mig dmar 'od dmar po 'bar na 'byung po thams cad la mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na gza' mig dmar 'od dmar po 'bar na 'byung po thams cad la mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: [If] Mars blazes with red light, it is not good for all the bhūtas.

original: yang na gza' mig dmar nam mkha' la rgyu zhing shar nub ltas mi snang bar 'gro na /
analyzed: yang na gza' mig dmar nam mkha' la rgyu zhing shar nub ltas mi snang bar 'gro na /
translated: [If] Mars moves in the sky and goes from east to west without being seen,

original: mi rigs bzhi rnams 'jigs par 'gyur //
analyzed: mi rigs bzhi rnams 'jigs par 'gyur //
translated: the four castes will be in fear.

original: gang dang gang gi rgyu skar nang du zhugs so //
analyzed: gang dang gang gi rgyu skar nang du zhugs so //
translated: [If] it enters any of the lunar mansions,

original: de ltar mi snang na mi de dag la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar mi snang na mi de dag la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: if it is not seen, it will harm those people.

original: nam gza' mig dmar rgyu skar dang ; skar ma kun gyi nang du 'od kyi mdog bzang por snang na /
analyzed: nam gza' mig dmar rgyu skar dang ; skar ma kun gyi nang du 'od kyi mdog bzang por snang na /
translated: When Mars appears with a good color of light among all the lunar mansions and stars,

original: mi rigs bzhi thams cad la phan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rigs bzhi thams cad la phan par 'gyur ro //
translated: it will be beneficial for all the four castes.

original: mig dmar gyi mdog dang / 'od nyams na mi dge ste ngan par blta'o //
analyzed: mig dmar gyi mdog dang / 'od nyams na mi dge ste ngan par blta'o //
translated: If the color of Mars and its light diminish, it is inauspicious, and one should view it as bad.

original: yang gza' mig dmar yon por 'gro zhing 'jug pa tsha ba zhes pa bya ba dang / gdong mchi ma can zhes bya ba dang / sbrul zhes bya ba dang / gdong dmar po zhes bya ba dang / mig dmar yon por 'gro bar drag shul can zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: yang gza' mig dmar yon por 'gro zhing 'jug pa tsha ba zhes pa bya ba dang / gdong mchi ma can zhes bya ba dang / sbrul zhes bya ba dang / gdong dmar po zhes bya ba dang / mig dmar yon por 'gro bar drag shul can zhes bya ba dang /
translated: Moreover, Mars moves crookedly and enters what is called the hot one, the one called the face with tears, the one called the snake, the one called the red face, and the one called the crookedly moving red eye.

original: de bzhin du gtun bu zhes bya ba dang / mig dmar shar ba rgyu skar bdun gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / yang na rgyu skar dgu'am yang na rgyu skar brgyad kyi nang du zhugs pa las phyir log na de ni yon po tshang ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gtun bu zhes bya ba dang / mig dmar shar ba rgyu skar bdun gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / yang na rgyu skar dgu'am yang na rgyu skar brgyad kyi nang du zhugs pa las phyir log na de ni yon po tshang ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Similarly, the one called the pestle, the red eye rising, entering among the seven stars, or entering among nine stars or eight stars, turning back from there, that is called the complete crooked one.

original: mig dmar de ltar zhugs pa la de'i tshe khang thog gi thad ka'am nags tshal gyi tor to'i ka nas mig dmar rtag tu rgyal ba bzhin du 'dug la /
analyzed: mig dmar de ltar zhugs pa la de'i tshe khang thog gi thad ka'am nags tshal gyi tor to'i ka nas mig dmar rtag tu rgyal ba bzhin du 'dug la /
translated: When Mars enters like that, at that time, from the top of a house or from the top of a tree in a forest, Mars always appears as if victorious.

original: nag gu reng reng po zhig tu gyur na rims nad kyang 'byung //
analyzed: nag gu reng reng po zhig tu gyur na rims nad kyang 'byung //
translated: If it becomes black and straight, there will be epidemics.

original: rab tu dga' ba med par byed //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba med par byed //
translated: It makes the people very unhappy.

original: gang dag me'i las kyis 'tsho zhing btso ba dang / sreg par byed pa de dag kyang me shor shing thar pas skye bzad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang dag me'i las kyis 'tsho zhing btso ba dang / sreg par byed pa de dag kyang me shor shing thar pas skye bzad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who live by the work of fire, who cook and burn, will be destroyed by the fire spreading and the wood burning.

original: rgyu skar bcu gcig gam yang na rgyu skar bcu 'am yang na bcu gnyis kyi nang du zhugs te 'dug na de ni gza' 'dra po yon por zhugs pa gdong 'chi ma zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rgyu skar bcu gcig gam yang na rgyu skar bcu 'am yang na bcu gnyis kyi nang du zhugs te 'dug na de ni gza' 'dra po yon por zhugs pa gdong 'chi ma zhes bya ste /
translated: If the moon enters the eleventh, tenth, or twelfth lunar mansion, that is called the “face of death” of the crooked planet Rāhu.

original: gza' de ltar zhugs pa na sprin du char pa 'bab ste /
analyzed: gza' de ltar zhugs pa na sprin du char pa 'bab ste /
translated: When that planet enters, rain falls from the clouds.

original: char legs par 'bab kyang gzhan gyis gnod pa byas bas pham par mi 'gyur //
analyzed: char legs par 'bab kyang gzhan gyis gnod pa byas bas pham par mi 'gyur //
translated: Even if the rain falls well, it will not be defeated by the harm of others.

original: mi'i lus kyi srog gzung lnga yang nad can du 'gyur ba de'i phyir na nad mang po 'byung bas mi kun rid cing skems pa dang / 'jig @49a * //
analyzed: mi'i lus kyi srog gzung lnga yang nad can du 'gyur ba de'i phyir na nad mang po 'byung bas mi kun rid cing skems pa dang / 'jig @49a * //
translated: The five life-holding winds in the human body become sick, and because of that many illnesses arise, causing all people to become emaciated and thirsty, and

original: rten du mi rnams la nad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rten du mi rnams la nad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: many illnesses will arise for humans in the world.

original: rgyu skar bcu gsum mam yang na rgyu skar bcu bzhi'i nang du gza' mig dmar zhugs pa las slar log na de ni yon po sbrul zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rgyu skar bcu gsum mam yang na rgyu skar bcu bzhi'i nang du gza' mig dmar zhugs pa las slar log na de ni yon po sbrul zhes bya ste /
translated: If Mars enters the thirteenth or fourteenth lunar mansion and then turns back, this is called “crooked serpent.”

original: glang po che rnams dang / sprul po che dang sbrul rnams kyis gnod pa byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: glang po che rnams dang / sprul po che dang sbrul rnams kyis gnod pa byed par 'gyur /
translated: It causes harm from elephants, great serpents, and snakes.

original: mtshon gyis smras pa rnams mi 'tsho //
analyzed: mtshon gyis smras pa rnams mi 'tsho //
translated: Those who are wounded by weapons do not recover.

original: sman dang 'bras bu rnams dang ; ldum bu rnams legs par smin cing 'khrungs par 'gyur /
analyzed: sman dang 'bras bu rnams dang ; ldum bu rnams legs par smin cing 'khrungs par 'gyur /
translated: Medicines, fruits, and herbs ripen and grow well.

original: char snyoms par 'bags bon thams cad rab tu 'khrung ngo //
analyzed: char snyoms par 'bags bon thams cad rab tu 'khrung ngo //
translated: Rain falls evenly and all seeds grow well.

original: yang rgyu skar bco lnga'am /
analyzed: yang rgyu skar bco lnga'am /
translated: If Mars enters the fifteenth or

original: bcu drug gi nang du gza' zhugs na /
analyzed: bcu drug gi nang du gza' zhugs na /
translated: sixteenth lunar mansion,

original: gang 'dra gshul can de gdong dmar po zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gang 'dra gshul can de gdong dmar po zhes bya ste /
translated: this is called “red face.”

original: rgyal po phan tshun 'thab cing g-yul bkye ste /
analyzed: rgyal po phan tshun 'thab cing g-yul bkye ste /
translated: Kings fight with each other and wage war.

original: mtshon gyis smas pas de'i tshe sha khrag gi 'dam du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshon gyis smas pas de'i tshe sha khrag gi 'dam du 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of being wounded by weapons, at that time there is a swamp of flesh and blood.

original: yang gza' mig dmar rgyu skar bcu bdun gyi nang du zhugs te /
analyzed: yang gza' mig dmar rgyu skar bcu bdun gyi nang du zhugs te /
translated: If Mars enters the seventeenth lunar mansion,

original: phyir log na de ni drag shul can dang / gtun bu drag po zhes bya ste /
analyzed: phyir log na de ni drag shul can dang / gtun bu drag po zhes bya ste /
translated: If it returns, it is called “the fierce one” or “the fierce pestle.”

original: de'i tshe na skye bo mang po rnams snying rje med //
analyzed: de'i tshe na skye bo mang po rnams snying rje med //
translated: At that time, many people will be without compassion,

original: snying brtse ba med //
analyzed: snying brtse ba med //
translated: without affection,

original: bka' khrims dang / chos lugs med de //
analyzed: bka' khrims dang / chos lugs med de //
translated: without laws or religion.

original: de'i dus ni skye bo rnams gcig la gcig ral gri dang / mdung bus 'debs shing 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i dus ni skye bo rnams gcig la gcig ral gri dang / mdung bus 'debs shing 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, people will increase in killing each other with swords and spears.

original: gzhan yang gza' mig dmar gza' drug tu 'pho zhing 'gro ba tshangs pa skye dgu'i bdag po ltar rab tu ston //
analyzed: gzhan yang gza' mig dmar gza' drug tu 'pho zhing 'gro ba tshangs pa skye dgu'i bdag po ltar rab tu ston //
translated: Moreover, Mars, the sixth planet, moves and goes, displaying itself like Brahma, lord of beings.

original: de lta bu la mig dmar de song ngam //🔽'dug gam / yod dam /
analyzed: de lta bu la mig dmar de song ngam // 'dug gam / yod dam /
translated: In that way, it is not suitable to say that Mars has gone,🔽or that it is present, or that it exists,

original: med dam byar yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: med dam byar yang mi rung ste /
translated: or that it does not exist.

original: de la nam zla ba gsum gyi bar du gza' mig dmar rab tu sang na de'i tshe skye bor mis nad kyis ma rung ba dang / sa'i bcud zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la nam zla ba gsum gyi bar du gza' mig dmar rab tu sang na de'i tshe skye bor mis nad kyis ma rung ba dang / sa'i bcud zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If Mars shines brightly for three months, at that time people will be afflicted with illness and the essence of the earth will be exhausted.

original: gza' mig dmar bong sa chung du 'gyur //
analyzed: gza' mig dmar bong sa chung du 'gyur //
translated: Mars will become small in size.

original: rnam par gzer bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam par gzer bar 'gyur //
translated: It will be painful.

original: rnam par gnod par 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam par gnod par 'gyur //
translated: will be harmed.

original: dkyil 'khor chung dur gyur par yul phyogs gang na snang ba de'i tshe mig dmar phan pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chung dur gyur par yul phyogs gang na snang ba de'i tshe mig dmar phan pa zhes bya ste /
translated: When Mars is in a small maṇḍala and is seen in a certain country, at that time Mars is beneficial.

original: de ni yul phyogs su gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni yul phyogs su gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then it will be beneficial for that country.

original: gza' mig dmar de ltar gyur na me'i las dang / me la rjed pa'i las byed pa'i mi dang / yul ma le bya'i mi dang / yul ku sha'i mi dang / yul nya sha'i mi dang / yul bi ti'i mi dang / yul sa la da mi'i mi rnams dang /
analyzed: gza' mig dmar de ltar gyur na me'i las dang / me la rjed pa'i las byed pa'i mi dang / yul ma le bya'i mi dang / yul ku sha'i mi dang / yul nya sha'i mi dang / yul bi ti'i mi dang / yul sa la da mi'i mi rnams dang /
translated: When Mars is like that, the people who do the work of fire, the people of the country of Malaya, the people of the country of Kuśa, the people of the country of Nyaśa, the people of the country of Vidi, the people of the country of Sālāmi,

original: yul la ba'i mi dang / yul mog tu'i mi dang / yul lta'i rjed pa'i mi rnams dang / yul mo gu ra dang / yul me'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / yul sba ra zhes pa 'di rnams la gza' gzhan gyis gza' mig dmar pham par byas nas yul de rnams kyi mi la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul la ba'i mi dang / yul mog tu'i mi dang / yul lta'i rjed pa'i mi rnams dang / yul mo gu ra dang / yul me'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / yul sba ra zhes pa 'di rnams la gza' gzhan gyis gza' mig dmar pham par byas nas yul de rnams kyi mi la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: the people of the country of Lava, the people of the country of Mugutu, the people of the country of Lata, the people of the country of Mogura, the country called Agni, and the country called Vara—these countries, when Mars is defeated by other planets, will be harmed by Mars.

original: gza' mig dmar 'jug pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gza' mig dmar 'jug pa bstan pa'o //
translated: This concludes the teaching on the entry of Mars.

original: a'arya sha ru la karn'i nang nas gza' skar gyi ltas 'byung ba btus pa /
analyzed: a'arya sha ru la karn'i nang nas gza' skar gyi ltas 'byung ba btus pa /
translated: Extracted from the Ārya Śārukarṇīya, the omens of the planets.

original: ltas dang mtshan ma dge bar gyur cig / rdzogs so /
analyzed: ltas dang mtshan ma dge bar gyur cig / rdzogs so /
translated: May the signs and omens be virtuous.
